Expected more.... We received tickets as part of the sightaeeing bus (which was awful) so im glad we did not pay extra. Just one tunnel which u could see from outside! Pointless.

Aquarium in Dubai mall. The aquarium is situated within Dubai mall. In addition to aquarium they have boat ride, fish feeding plus zoo for water animals.
The aquarium is just 100ft tunnel walk with many variety of fish. Major attraction is sharks & tuna.
All inclusive the cost is 130 AED.
They got jungle theme restaurant inside which has awesome ambience ...good for kids.

One of the best. The only thing negative is the very high price, rest is worth it, everything well detailed and quite a huge walk through. The exotic fishes are one of a kind and the zoo , night animals, mini aquarium, touch pools, feeding the animals is a big plus. Takes about 1.30 mins or more to see it end to end, spread across three floors.

Dubai Mall Aqarium. Wow, spectacular. Although we did not go in the aquarium (which did cost), we were just amazed and breath taken at the size of this aquarium in the middle of the mall. This is worth going to see even just by viewing it from the outside.

The lagoon . A good attraction to visit. Surprisingly a big place. I wouldn't recommend feeding the fish as you don't what happens is you throw the food from behind a barrier. You can also go for a ride in a boat if you want, we chose not too. Loved seeing the penguins they were good.
Well no words for its praise. Dubai aquarium made in dubai mall. Biggest aquarium. So beautiful. And underwater diving in the aquarium not there. . .
A must see. For us , this was better that the Fountains, the Grand kids were there for ages trying to name the fish, and if you dont want to pay to go inside, it FREE to look from the outside
Dubai Mall. Its amazing...The biggest aquarium and especially in a mall........you can watch free also from outside.......but you will enjoy getting inside.......Its surely a must watch to all......

Never seen anything like it. Set inside the Mall this aquarium is truly amazing. The tunnel walk is great. The fish are all around you. Sharks, rays and many many more fish. Crocodile, penguins, otters, spider crabs, octopus etc etc.............
Nice attraction. Lots of aquatic animals to see including a huge alligator, or crocodile. I don't really know the difference. A nice place to take the kids.

Nice concept but not worth the fee paid. Although well done and the quality is great, it is clearly not worth the money paid especially if you want to experience everything. Also the flow of things doesn't make much sense and we felt somewhat lost trying to figure out where to go. I would recommend watching from the outside

So fun!. Depending on where you live shopping malls usually aren't such amazing attractions! None of the malls near my home have Aquariums and Underwater Zoo's in them - this was such a neat attraction! The Dubai Mall is very busy so I would plan to get here early to hopefully avoid the long lines. Walking through these habitats was great and seeing the wide range of sea life was amazing, however, you can also get into the Aquarium! My husband and I were able to do a "shark walk" inside the huge aquarium and really become part of the exhibit which was a really neat experience! A guide went down with us and (for an additional fee) took a video with a GoPro during the entire "dive" which was a great souvenir! You can also take a ride in a glass bottom boat (if you don't want to get into the water) or you can scuba dive, if certified! Great for families but my husband and I enjoy this attraction without kids too. Plus, being in the mall, there are so many shopping and attraction options that you could really spend a whole day here.
Wow. This was serial walking through with all the fish swimming around you. Doesn't cost a lot and the experience was lovely. Got many pictures of the different species. Would recommend.
Must see if you are traveling with kids. Great experience, can be crowded after 1pm. Kids love it and especially in a huge mall where they may get bored with the shopping walks

Superb visit a must!. When you start you think there isn't much to it but then you go on and upwards and more still. Amazing collection of animals and to see a zoo inside a shopping centre is unreal! Some of the add on options seem a little pricey but the basic package gives great value and enjoyment to all the family.

Free with a 48 hour ON OFF BUS. We enjoy aquariums and have visited many of them throughout the world. This was is in four levels of the Dubai Mall. Take the time to visit all levels. Each level is different and allow several hours for the experience. By the way, it is free with a 48 hour ON OFF BUS receipt.

Brilliant afternoon . We visited the Burj Khalifa and on the way out saw the aquarium and decided to visit the aquarium & underwater zoo we paid 100 AED around £20 each but it was really worth it , you get to see the main aquarium free in the mall it is absolutely massive the diversity of fish and corrals is incredible you walk down the main aquarium and then turn and walk through a long tunnel through the middle of the tank and are inches away from tiger sharks , Ray's and numerous fish .You then go upstairs and look found numerous aquariums with a amazing variance of fish and also see two really large crocodiles about 5 meters long , there are penguins and other birds as well Once you have finished you get a behind the scenes tour which is really interesting , you can pay to do other adventures if you wish you can have a glass bottom boat ride around the top of the main tank , you can feed the Rays and also you can pay to dive in the main tank if you are qualified , there is a lot to do for all ages and budgets you can even see the main tank free in the mall if you don't want to see the rest of the zooAll in all a great half day out at a reasonable price.

Disappointing . I thought this was underwhelming and over priced the crocodile was worth a visit but apart from that I don't see what the fuss is about maybe the one at the Atlantis would be better and which we didn't get to see during this visit.

" Amazing Sea World !!! ". The must see attraction in Dubai Mall.. Make bookings online to save the time & it will get cheaper when you book with At The Top Burz Khalifa Tickets...It is the biggest aquarium I ever saw.. You can enjoy it free from outside... After taking tickets you will get permission to enter the underground tunnel & there is, you can see the big Sharks will swim over your head & so many sea species you will encounter from everywhere...The underwater zoo is on 2nd floor & there are lots of sea species & a big crocodile are waiting for you.. Nicely created Jungle will definitely Amaze you.. Overall great experience.. My kid enjoyed most.. Worth visit...

Much bigger that what it seems. You will start your journey with a tunnel and you will have the feeling you can almost touch the sharks. Then you will get on the glass bottom boat and discover other species. After the ride you will see acquariums full with enchanting and rare species. You will finsih with king crocs a huge crocodile in company of his queen. I recommand highly this attraction for all ages.
Great Aquarium. Great Aquarium and it has sharks too!! Some really nice fish I took the kids whilst the wife did some shopping it's great to see this in a shopping mall excellent experience

Nice.. Located at Dubai mall. We enjoyed the experience immensely. One of our favourites was the 'Finding Nemo' crew!! Seeing the hammer head sharks just swimming overhead was exciting. I would recommend getting tickets on-line or going to the mall early. And seeing the aquarium before walking around the mall and getting fatigued.I will be back if ever in dubai again.

Amazing. The Underwater Zoo and Aquarium is situated in Dubai Mall. Good for kids as they are gonna enjoy the sharks swimming above. They have many varieties of sharks and fishes and one should also visit the aquarium also.

Good variety of fish and huge king crocodile. It was a nice variety of fish, but comparing to other arge scale aquariums say in Singapore it seemed a bit cramped and at times the fish were all togehter and there was not enough information about different species. The night animals seemed trapped in small cages. Huge crocodile, king croc was great for photos. But a large wall of the aqarium you can see in Dubai mall for free. I'd say if you haven't been to a large scale aquarium before it is worth a visit. Do not miss the second floor where the zoo is!
Watch the under world.. This a very big aquarium with fishes from sea.. I saw sharks and other fishes there.. first time in my life saw the under water world.

Only Dubai can pull this off.. Absolutely amazing. It is just beautiful and you feel like you are face to face with all the fish. clearest view of the sharks and you can't believe that just glass separates you from all the underwater life. They keep adding new features so it is fun to do every 7 to 8 months. The kids will love this and as grown ups we love it too.

Superb place. Must Visit. Superb place to see a large variety of Aquatic species at one place. I suggest to take Aquarium ticket combined with At the Top of Burj Khalifa. Its economic and a nice experience of all the places i.e. At the top, Aquarium and Dubai Zoo. You can easily spent your half day covering these 3 places.

OK. I dint like it much as there is nothing special with this aquarium. Ofcourse it is present in a mall, but apart from that it is similar to other aquariums. If you have seen various aquariums, then you can skip this :)
inside the dubai mall you will see many animals inside the water amzaming place. inside the dubai mall you will see many animals inside the water amzaming place ticket is 120 dirham
very good. this palace is in dubai mall.after shoping you could enjoy underwater zoo.every thing was good.i sugest that visit it
Nice. Pre book if you can. Its cheaper and you dont have to Q. Q can be long but nice experience. Aquarium is very short but Zoo is deffinitely worth visiting.

Mr Solomon is the man for the guided tour. I honestly reluctantly went on this tour but it blew my mind, the different exotic looking sea creatures and that awfully long crocodile??...Just go see for yourself and be sure to request for Mr solomon...he was passionate about his job and it showed
unreal. best experience of our lives this was unreal and the all staff especially "BOND" where very helpfully and made the experience even better

Brilliant!!. We went to the Dubai Mall and decided to go into the Aquarium and glad we did. For around £40 for 2 of us (researcher @ AED 100 per person) we thoroughly enjoyed our visit and ended up spending nearly 2 hours looking around. The King Croc was massive and the back of the house tour was informative and interesting. The Aquarium is well worth paying for and would highly recommend a visit.

nice tunnel but a bit small overall. Novelty wore off quickly after the photos were taken. It's not the best aquarium I have visited, but it was great being located within Dubai mall - didn't have to travel for it,

Shark Dive at Dubai Mall Aquarium. My son and his friend recently got their PADI and wanted to do a shark dive. Being very young (10 and 11) the equipment unfortunately was too big. Resulting in my son's facemark being flooded the entire time. In my opinion NOT worth the money spent. Boys also complained the regulators used weren't superb quality. Of course the sharks made up for any disappointments.

nice but short tunnel. the aquarium's tunnel was quite short. If you've never seen/been to an underwater tunnel before, then you can mark it in your TO Do List in Dubai, but to be honest, I thought it was more impressive looking at the tank from the outside which was free.
Wildlife Wonder!. It was a good sight. It brings alive what is commonly seen on wildlife documentaries. Different specie of fishes and admirable underwater experince.
Entertaining. This one of Dubai's wonder places. Once you have time be sure to check it out early in your visit. Another must see

Fascinating . It's a mixture of sea life and statues relating to the lost chambers theme. Plenty of sea life to see, but full walk around only lasts about 30mins although you can spend all day walking around if you wish. Staff were great and very knowledgeable in the sea life. Kids loved asking questions & touching the creatures.

Fun and educational. We had taken my 4 year old for a trip to the aquarium and underwater zoo. It was a great place to spend a eduatining time for the whole family. My daughter was facinated by the King Croc and his family

Loved the otters and the penguins !. The underwater zoo is good with the King croc which you get to see from a glass panel. Even the desert animals section is a good add on. The big glass water panel with the various fishes is very attractive and can be seen bu one and all, the glass tunnel for which you have to pay is nothing great. The underwater zoo is on the second floor.

Burj and Aquarium . Both of these places are amazing the Aquarium is amazing to visit, it shows you so many ocean creatures that you would not be able to see so up close and then there is the zoo to visit as well brilliant

Beautiful. It was such a beautiful aquarium. The tunnel was probably the best part for us personally. We did the explorer package and we were able to do the glass bottom boat and the simulator with it. It was a good length of time and plenty of creatures to see.

Great experience. You have to do this if you go the Dubai mall. It's just simply amazing how they created this aquarium. You cannot miss it because it's huge and there's always a crowd of people taking pictures. Prices are fair except if you do the whole glass bottom boat and underwater excursion.

Amazing,an Aquarium in a shopping mall! Absolutely a must see!. Amazing, an Aquarium in a shopping mall in the "Desert"! Absolutely a must see!
Spend some time there it is brilliant

3 Floors In door Aquarium . Its one of the biggest indoor Aquarium in the world.
You can see diver feeding food to Tiger Shark's and several other fish.
It's one of the biggest attractions of Dubai Mall.
No one can skip the this attractions as it's one of its kind.

So worth it......my daughters loved it. We purchased tickets for the city sightseeing tours hop on hop off bus, which I would highly recommend. When purchasing barter with the seller as my husband was initially quoted 750 dirhams and paid 500 in the end (100 GBP approx) this was for two adults and two children. Our aquarium tickets and underwater zoo tickets came free with this sight seeing ticket, so that was £100 well spent. My daughters lived the aquarium and zoo. Would highly recommend both. Get to see lots of see life close up. We all really enjoyed this. The biggest aquarium I have seen in my life!!
Birthday Celebration. The Dubai mall first let me say was out of this world. We took a tour of the underwater zoo and aquarium which was awesome. Its a must see.

Variety of Sea creatures to see!. We loved the experience of Aquarium and Underwater Zoo. There are so many species of aquatic animals that you will be appalled sheer excitement! A huge crocodile ' King' as they call him..!! All of it in Dubai Mall!! Brilliant execution and very well organised. You can give a miss to the boat ride with glass floor..

Beautiful. I live in Atlanta and always thought that we had the largest floor to ceiling aquarium....nope Dubai does it bigger. Get there early. The lines are very long. There is very interesting sea life to see. If you don't want to go in, you can see the wall from inside of the mall.
Just wow!. This is a must see attraction, I need no words to describe our experience, people need to experience for themselves, will definitely love it!
Patience is a virture. Long queue's for this one and patience is essential here. the views are very impressive lot's of variety of fish on display more here than in the gulf.

Worth a trip. We visited on a ticket which was included with the Burj Khalifa for a few extra pounds and it was well worth it. The walk through tunnel on the ground floor is great, and the the zoo upstairs is fantastic, even my grumpy teenagers weren't bored, perfect for younger children!!

Unique aquarium tour in Dubai. From Dubai mall, there was many people looking at the Dubai aquarium from the mall. Before I just took pictures from the outside, but this time we paid to enter. The initial travel thru the tunnel was similar to other aquarium. But there where other subsequent activities that made it different as guide were explaining how they study abd breed the different underwater species. There was also the zoo that shows all the other unique fishes.

Something Fishy. Enter the Dubai Mal and be prepared to be amazed. There before you is the largest aquarium you have ever seen, way beyond imagination. Filled with the greatest variety of marine creatures you have ever seen outside of the ocean. Sharks, dogfish, rays and groupers to mention but a few. Keep watch and see the diver, looking like a pigmy, with his vacuum cleaner cleaning out the tank, if you can call it a tank. Be amazed at the size and quantity of fish swimming about ignoring the insignificant diver doing his job.

Not worth the money!. Paid 100dh for the cheapest package. I have been to much better Aquarium than this for much less price!If you have been to other Aquarium than not worth going, but if you like spending or wasting your money than definitely the perfect place for you!
Great value for money. We loved Dubai Aquarium, especially King Croc and the viewing tunnel. It is not a large place, but well worth a couple of hours of your time.

Wonderful attraction for children. The aquarium is a spectacle not to be missed with the biggest piece of perspex ever containing sharks and rays and other fish, all can be viewed from the shopping mall too. Definitely worth paying to go inside the aquarium though and experience the actual tour.

Very short travel under the aquarium. Very short travel under the aquarium. Underwater Zoo in the second floor is interesting. Can be skipped if some one has been to similar places in Singapore or other countries..

Friendly staff and fun experience . I visited the zoo on 27 May and I really enjoyed my visit there. The aquarium is massive and there is a large variety of species. I joined Otter Encounter, costed around £40, a bit pricey but it was well-worth it. Staffs were extremely helpful and friendly. I would love to say thanks to Gu and Shan, my phone was running out of power and they went out of their way to help me to take pictures. It was a fantastic experience and I was really surprised by the friendliness of the staffs! I really loved the whole trip and would definitely come back again!!

It's an ok visit . We have been to the mall many times ,so decided we should have a look at the aquarium, it is definitely not worth the money but then this is Dubai. There are some amazing fish etc but I have to say this is not one of Dubai's most spectacular.still worth a look however.even if you don't pay and look from the shop side.
Enter the Tunnel and see all lovely sea creatures. To access it you need to pay some fees, it is bit expensive if you have lots of family members but they will enjoy it

Small but fun!. It was lovely! I agree it is smaller than expected but London Aquarium is not that big. We paid 200 AED to take part in feeding the crocodiles but we were late (parking ) as you have to get there half an hour before. So the lady gave us another package at no extra cost ( 50 AED) even though we were in the wrong. I would recommend the explorer package, as the simulator is only exciting if you are under ten years of age. However, the glass bottom boat and the tour to see a gentlemen feed the fish was a brilliant experience. The wast amount of space for the species in the tunnel was lovely. I felt sorry for the King crocodile and his lady as they were big and I would have liked their area to have been bigger. The Penguins were nice but the crocodiles took everyone's attention away from them.

see it free from outside without buying ticket. This is inside the mall and on first floor it's good and you don't need to buy the ticket what ever you see from outside glass you see it walking under tunnel and little closer to glass instead from far. You can take photos from outside and this is great experience.
Must see. Extremly huge aquarium with many interesting fishes. Over busy days ots not good view,but catch any time in weekend afternoon and will be very nice experience,high recommended!
Trip to Dubai aquarium . We recently visited Dubai Mall and my son asked to see the aquarium. It was a good visit. My son loved the whole trip, plenty to see and keep him entertained.

Fantastic zoo and so much to look at.. On our recent trip to Dubai my husband and I visited the aquarium and zoo when we were at the Dubai Mall. Despite not having kids with us, we really enjoyed the spectacle and all that the zoo offered.

amazing aquarium. There are so many species, the aquarium is really great. The walk isn't so long but you can stay for a while and watch. From the outside it is so tall, you can see it from the upper levels also. The underwater zoo is on the second floor, and it has a large variety of species also.

Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo. Save yourself some money...”and just view it from the mall. Don't bother with the entrance fees. You can see all the sea life you'll want to see (sharks, sting rays,While there we went to the Dubai Aquarium and had a fantastic time. We went with family including two young children,

Just look at it for free. It's very pretty but you can pretty much see it from the outside, no need to buy a ticket. The ticket allows you a closer view and you can walk threw the tunnel for about 120drm

Nothing special. It is a nice place, very small and limited collection. It is nothing special nice to walk around check the displayed species but not really special. what is nice about it is that it is located in the mall. not really worth paying for it, it should be made a walk through passage fro all to see with some protection maybe to avoid kids and people manipulating the place.

Very big and nice aquarium!. I like it,inside there really interesting,they have different kinds of fishes,very small jellyfishes different colors its looking wow!and there floors like glass u can see throug it and its awesome under u swuming sharks and other fishes!if u will pay and will book before u can dive there also.

indoors ocean. the best and largest Aquarium I have visited. it has the largest one piece frontal glass in the world. goes up 3 levels of Dubai's mall. you can find many large and small species of fish there. huge sharks swimming around in there.magnificent a must see .

Disappointing. Total disappointment. Expected an amazing underwater aquarium but it was so quick like taking a walk to the end of a short garden. Didn't like to see the large Crocodile confined to such a small space.the simulator was a joke. The glass boat is over exaggerated. Visit Atlsntis instead as it's much better.

So many species . This aquarium is truly epic. There are so many kinds of fish and the pure scale is mind blowing. The only downside of it is that it is really really busy around the aquarium window. But then again, it is so tall that the people won't block your view of the fish.
aquarium. a very big variety of fishes, sea animals. We were impressed by the huge crocodile, the medusas like lace, I could touch the sea star.
Amazing attraction . Hubbys we're delighted ! Ladies shopped and men and the kids did the underwater zoo and tunnel !! Absolutely adored by kids and hubbys ! Well worth the ticket !

Amazing Aquarium. On a recent trip to Dubai, my first visit, we went to tha Dubai Mall. The mall itself is impressive, impressive probably doesnt give it credit.While there we went to the Dubai Aquarium and had a fantastic time. We went with family including two young children, there were so many different types of fish and of course King Croc. Its easy while wandering round to forget you are in a mall.100aed per person, about 20 gbp, means its good value for money.
Save yourself some money.... and just view it from the mall. Don't bother with the entrance fees. You can see all the sealife you'll want to see (sharks, sting rays, large fish).

overpriced, nothing special. There is nothing special about this attraction, except that it's only of its' kind located in the Mall. Big fish tank that you can see from Level 2 of the mall is actualy the most interesting thing there is to be seen, and you can look at it without paying. Entrance tickets are quite expensive and if you do want to see fish and other sea creatures, I'd rahter visit aquavanture aquarium instead. There is a small zoo inside where you can see a crocodile, but still, I wasn't impressed with this attraction. Not worth the money paid for the tickets.
" Awesome". So much to see at this attraction in the Dubai Mall.The staff explains everything in detail. It was an educational and enlightening experience. There was even a fish hospital. WOW

Cool attraction for visitors. This is always fun for anyone coming to Dubai. It is not as good as it used to be since they covered up much of the top and it feels much smaller. They also took out many of the bigger sharks, but it is still enormous and fun for people. worth a visit always.

Overrated . Paid for the "VIP" experience which was about 370 dirhams for my boyfriend and I. I have to be honest and say that the whole experience is very underwhelming. I can imagine how this can be appealing to a family with young children, however I would recommend saving your money and just look at the tank for free from the outside. If you truly want to pay, just buy the basic ticket.
It was ok . It's something new to watch great aquarium, but I didn't enjoy it much it's just not my thing , but my family loved it specially the glass boat it was very nice

Why Pay?. I can't see why, other than for Kids, anyone would want to pay to walk through this attraction when you can just stand in the Mall and look at most of the aquatic life. For sure the location in a shopping centre is interesting and walking through gets you closer but I recommend you don't let the kids know about the tunnel, look from the outside and then treat the kids to an ice-cream instead,

Not the best! . Unless you are absolutely obsessed with Sea life I wouldn't waste my money.It's nothing amazing & quite boring at times actually. The king croc was ok but the glass you saw him through was pretty dirty & as he just lay there dead there wasn't much to see!!!
Fantastic. Seeing the colorful fish shark the electric shock fishSeeing crocodile the biggest one all over the world in Dubai

Talented otters . Fab aquarium and underwater zoo with plenty to see and do . We spent a good 4 hours there . The feedings were a highlight especially the otter one . The way they had trained Them was incredible and the keeper Aaron was very informative and his love for the animals shone through . King croc is humongous and even having been to Australia zoo I had never seen a 5 metre long croc! Great day out for adults and kids , nice coffee shop inside to rest your feet or get a caffeine fix Reasonably priced too highly recommended

Wooow.... This aquarium is out of this world. My daughter enjoed seeing all kinds of fish that was in there..from smallest to biggest..sharks n other species...from outside you alredy have a gr8 view..goin through the tunnel is a whole lot of experience...u get to see the sea creatures really close and detailed...and you can photo souvenirs at the end but they are a bit pricy...
A must to do at the mall, Dubai.. There are various cost entry levels ie basic entry and then add on components. We did the basics and has a blast, particularly the glassed crocodile enclosure.

Worth a look. Had a entertainer voucher for buy one get one free which allowed us only to do the basics from the large walk through tank to the zoo upstairs which all the tanks etc. Extras can be added for feeding rays and keeper interactions and if you have the cash shark dive but it be cheaper to get PADI cert and dive in the wild.As a diver it was nice to see but just wanted to get in the tank all the time !! Our entry cost equivalent of £12 for 2 with the voucher which was nothing really and it was nice.Check out King Croc he's a big lad

Good but over expensive!!. The place is over expensive, 100 dhiram for the tour is more than what it should be. For the people who have not seen shark and other sea creature in real can have life time experience. In 100 Dhiram/ each person package includes another fish place where you have more fishes and sea creatures.
Dubai mall. The place Dubai aquarium & underwater zoo is worth visiting .The mall is also beautiful to see and shop.

Awesome experience. This was an impromptu booking whist leisurely browsing through the Dubai Mall after a late lunch. The member of staff making the booking was helpful and gave permission for my wife to go inside the diving area as she was too scared to dive with the sharks herself. However, when we went upstairs, the staff at the door were quite rude and would not allow my wife to go through.The experience itself was brilliant and I would highly recommend!

amazing place. amazing...!!! perhaps this is the best definition of the aquarium.My son enjoyed and I learned a lot of new content from site.Children and their parents will have a great time on this place
A must Visit in DXB. Excellent entertainment space in Dubai Mall, Now King Croc is the main Highlight of this aquarium. Dear Folks don't miss this adventure.
Holiday. Amazing so bloody nice must go see my 15month old daughter loved it and if you can go do an experience worth it if you can afford it as it is very expensive.

Good times for all. I went to the aquarium with my wife, Dubai aquarium has a good variety of marine life, also there where some activities that I did not see in other aquariums, such as diving and the transparent boat ride.

Good but not ideal for families with more than 2 children . Each 120 basic package , very good place to see but with more than one child it is a bit expensive , takes half of you budget ! However inside you require 3 hours to look read info and take pictures very good resources and adventure for kids to remember .
Calming Experience After Loads of Shopping. Went there and used The Entertainer Coupon which saved us AED 70 as we bought the combo ticket. Overall very good.
Expensive. Its a good aquarium but I felt it was expensive for what it offers. Maybe, its more like a family outing, kids will enjoy

Worth a visit, especially the underwater zoo on 2nd floor. If you are doing Burj Khalifa, then opt for a combo ticket. Expect a wait time of 10-15 minutes to get your tickets. The tunnel walk is on the ground floor and it is a small tunnel. We saw plenty of fishes but there was no description of them - so it was just a walk.The zoo is on the 2nd floor. The major attraction for us was seeing the King Crocodile - it was HUGE. Families had fun posing with a crocodile kept there.The educational tour (also known as the experience) is certainly worth going to - same floor and takes about 10 minutes. The highlight of it is the feeding of the fish. Plus the view from top of the aquarium where we saw people walking through the tunnel. They also have a glass bottom boat tour, which is not part of the package.
Great Experience. I would surely say it's value for money, and it's one of a kind experience. I would surely recommend to go here if you are in the Dubai mall.

Amazing Experience!. We recently took our grand daughter to the Aquarium and we all absolutely loved it. It is so amazing how you can walk through the glass tube and literally be inches away from sharks and mantarays. The variety of fish is simply stunning. The underwater zoo was also a fun treat. Beware of the people trying to sell pictures for a huge amount of money.

Dubai Mall Aquarium. Visited In the afternoon around 3 o clock the till area was busy and disorganised waited over 20 mins did basic package and was disappointed .Fish seemed to be crammed in tanks upstairs and you could see more of the Sharks etc from the mall window so wasn't worth paying to go in was in 30 mins .
Amazing.. Fantastic experience. How do they get all those fish to live together without eating each other? Wonderful sight.

Amazing aquarium, dodgy business practices. Like many attractions in Dubai, when you go to buy your tickets they will mislead you about what your money will buy. I researched prices online, so I knew there was a cheaper ticket option, but when you go to buy a ticket, they don't even advertise the cheapest option - you have to ask about it. So we spent about 70 dirham if I remember correctly and that gave us more than enough to look at for maybe 2 hours. In fact, we had to cut short our visit with our toddler to go up the Burj Khalifa. We could have happily spent another 30 minutes there.
Not for everyone. Tunnel not very long but nice variety of fish. Zoo is actually in a different area and about two flights up in the mall. Not much to see in the zoo, mainly fish and reptiles.

Overall good but pricey (especially if you have a 3 year old "adult"). Overall we were happy with the visit to the Dubai aquarium, with the visit marred by the fact that 3 years old is classified as an adult - shocking to have to pay full price for a 3 year old CHILD and its not exactly cheap. The aquarium and underwater zoo are stocked with some interesting fish and underwater life, with the giant alligator being quite amazing, alongside the giant crabs. I felt very sorry for the octopus which was almost as big as the tank he was in - criminal to keep it in such a small tank. Dubai aqaurium and underwater zoo you really need to review your "child" policy and stop ripping off parents of small children - most decent proprietors charge adult prices from 12/13 years old not 3 (and even then 12/13 is not an adult)!

wonderful. we had been to this place while our visit to burj khalifa. This is within the dubai mall. whenever you plan to visit dubai plan at least 5-6 days to see such things in depth. you will surprise to see the type of fish and other species in the underwater zoo.so must see this attraction.

A must to sea. I had a feeling that i want to jump woth this creatures, very good place, specially to the children, ticjet were 100 AED for tunnel and underwater zone, the other options not allowed for younger than 2 years, the itgera were 120, 200, 250

Not much to see here.... We had this as an add on to the water park tickets so gave it a look. It was over very quickly. The large tank was impressive however just seemed to be lots of the same types of fish, Ray's, Eeels etc. I don't know how much this would cost on its own but I wouldn't bother. It was very busy too, lots of people pushing to the front of the glass, posing for multiple pictures and getting in everyone's way. The Albino Style crocodile was pretty cool however they were trapped in an area not much bigger than my suitcase

Not all that great, but enjoyable for kids. If you have seen aquariums in other countries, you will be disappointed here. It is just an ordinary one. Aquarium required just 10-15 minutes to cover, but the underwater zoo on the second floor has many varieties and requires more than one hour.

Impressed. We thought we would just watch the tunnel from the mall but husband decided to pay and see right through. It went on forever so money well spent. We had the tunnel, boat ride, submarine stimulator, underwater zoo deal. So much to see, it's been very well done. Then of course watched the fountains from outside the mall.
Totally worth it. Best feature of the mall. A bit pricy but worth seeing all the different fishes. My small baby boy was mesmerised by all the different fish.

Fantastic Adventure. I was already a fairly experienced scuba diver and I got a surprise gift of Diving with Sharks in Dubai Mall. One of the most memorable gifts I've ever had.No other dive I have had comes close. With sharks eerily and smoothly gliding by; huge sting rays (very) closely floating past and a huge grouper hiding behind a rock. Many other beautiful coloured fish swimming round, I could not have hoped for more. Even stranger to see and wave to your family looking into the absolutely enormous aquarium.Wonderful dive and you get your fully completed PADI log completed to finish the adventure. I was also lucky to have a helpful and experienced instructor Ivan Gultiano to make sure I did not get into any problems.

Worth exploring. I heard a lot about this place and I am glad I checked it out. I am not one to enjoy the typical touristy sites, but this place is lovely. It is inside a shopping center and visiting the underwater zoo would make an excellent day out if you have kids or if you're travelling as a family. I loved the 'shark zone' tunnel. Be mindful, this is really busy place - so if you cannot handle that, you might want to go at a quieter time.

Nice experience . We choosed tickets "explorer" for 100 AED each, cause there was everything we wanted to see. For tickets is possible to pay with credit card or cash. Tunnel is nice, you can see fishes really closely, some of them are really scary. Front of tunnel stuff will take pictures of you front of green wall and later you can buy those pictures of you inside tunnel. ZOO is in another floor, you can see fishes, tortoises, jellyfishes and others water animals. Explorer tickets included guided "behind the scene" tour, which was really interesting. We saw feeding of fishes, breeding and hospital. Other programs are offering more, but we didn't want to spend a lot of time there. I guess everyone can find something for himself there - front of the entrance is explained clearly what you will see in each program.

Impressive. This facility is first rate. Even for adults the facility is worth a visit. Being Australians, perhaps we were more aware of the large range of aquatic species, but it was clean and the marine life very well cared for.

I'll have 'Fish' and chips thanks. Arrived early to quickly explore the worlds larges indoor shopping centre. I'm not one for shopping, just ask my wife, but I was in awe once I started exploring the venue. A multi storey Aquarium in the middle, ice skating ring, waterfalls and every shop you could think off.

Epic!!! . We enjoyed this SO MUCH!!!! Sting ray feeding, penguin feeding and shark feeding- WOW!!! Croc feeding wasnt as wow as we thought it would be but thats expected seen as the crocs have a huge mouthful! Huge and amazing!!! The underwater zoo was fantastic! We enjoyed it all!

The Aquarium is fantastic. The Aquarium is fantastic array of fish, however I found the aquatic displays in the Underwater Zoo outstanding. A varied arrange of fish and animals. Take your time and read about all the exhibits.

Amazing. Located at the Dubai Mall, what an incredible Aquarium. For a small fee you can walk through and observed all the various types of Marine life and enjoy and little boat ride with your guide. A definite must do when in Dubai and at the end you can enjoy the Dubai Fountains as it is located on the outside of the Mall.

Out of this world underwater experience. Fantastic trip, the tunnel walk was amazing so many different species to be admired. Wonderful way to spend a few hours in the afternoon. Would recommend this experience to young, old, middle aged, couples, families or even singles.Amazing!

For kids and adults.... Let me start by saying, i love going to the aquarium. I love this aquarium because it feels like you are actually in the water based on the tube design. I wish they had benches on the inside but i know that if they did, no one would ever leave. we also got a behind the scenes view of the fish being fed and some beautiful jelly fish. all in all a great way to spend an afternoon. not to mention, it's in the mall!!! how convenient!
Dubai aquarium. Visited here looks ok but not so.. maybe I am just expecting a different kind of attraction... looks ok but not so..

World's Largest Octopus!! :). This Aquarium and underwater zoo is inside a MALL.. now that itself is quite interesting if you think about it! Set aside for approximately 3hrs to comfortably visit both the places without any rush. The cage snorkeling is awesome!! it is so thrilling when they take us down in box cages into aquarium filed with Tons and Tons of water and sharks swimming around us!! :) I have to mention the OCTOPUS Kraken. It is a beauty to watch it move around so gracefully. It is very huge!!the Crocodile feeding is also amazing to watch. and Do take a walk into the night-tunnel and try to see if you can identify the nocturnal creatures!! :)
Extremely good. Loved the aquarium & underwater zoo. Having 33000 species is definitely commendable and looking after them. Seen so different kinds of species which are not normal to seen anywhere.

Great for kids, inside the air con mall. Free ntry with the hop on hop off red bus. Free entry with your hop on hop off red bus ticket, and inside the air con Mall. A fairly large display and the only negative for me was having birds coupled up inside.

Found the Zoo more informative than the aquarium. The Aquarium is stocked with a fantastic array of fish, however I found the aquatic displays in the Underwater Zoo outstanding. A varied arrange of fish and animals. Take your time and read about all the exhibits.

Spectacular, great for the kids. Well worth a visit although even though it is very big it is still smaller than the enormous tank at the Atlantis on the Palm. Great activities to do related to the tank and not overly expensive for a family. Or you can just stand and watch the fish ( including sharks and Rays drifting by.peacefully

Surreal experience while shopping. This is definitely a world class aquarium viewed from all shopping levels at the centre of the mall. It's quite a surreal experience to see sharks and stingrays float past your head while shopping and has a surprisingly calming and soothing effect on you amidst all the hoards of people moving about. And it's free.

Largest Aquarium Window. A key centerpiece is Dubai Aquarium, one of the largest tanks in the world at 51m x 20m x 11m and featuring one of the world's largest viewing panel at 32.8m wide and 8.3m high. Dubai Aquarium has more than 33,000 living animals, representing more than 85 species including over 400 sharks and rays combined.
Ticket Price :Dhs100-200

Great place for all ages. Fantastic aquarium great couple of hours in the middle of the mall we did the glass bottom boat a behind the scenes tour the tunnel and the underwater zoo fantastic three hour tour

Nice Zoo. Wonderful experience, My daughter and I enjoyed the tunnel it was not so long but it was fun. The Underwater zoo is two floors above with wonderful collection of animals and then there was a section for Desert animals. We liked the demonstration of how the animals are bred and fed. Overall nice experience. Will suggest people who have visited other aquariums in the worldI bought the tickets along with Burj Khalifa and this costed me 50 dhirams lower

OK but nothing too startling. We booked this prior to our trip and that was a good idea to avoid the queues. We've seen a few Aquariums in our time and this one was nothing too startling. I think we zipped around in about 30 mins. The glass bottom boat ride was not really worth it and the main attraction was the crocodile exhibit; coming from Australia to see Australian things wasn't overly impressive. Main aquarium tank was big but. Something more for the kids I'd suggest.

Amazing. This was great to get to see all the fish, sharks and stingrays all up close. You also got to see behind the scenes depending on the type of ticket you bought. There was even the opertunity to go into the tank with the sharks. The aquarium was huge but the underwater zoo was fairly small in comparison but still worth seeing, children would probably enjoy this, however my husband and I enjoyed seeing this too.

An impressive mall aquarium. I believe that you will fall in love with this aquarium when you see it from outside. And the best part of it would be to dive in the aquarium and swim among the fish. Not bad for a non-routine activity. It has different levels and several fish, flora and fauna exhibits. A selection of different ticket types are available, offering customized visits to meet your preferences such as snorkeling, diving etc. Make sure that you do not go there when schools are taking the children for a tour. It will be a nightmare rather than a fun activity. By the way children’s love it.

Seriously !!!!!!!. Wooow...wooow....wooowI cant believe how much this aquarium has changed since my last visit in 2012.Basically back then it was just a simple visit in the tunnel where you admired several types of marine animals swimming in the huge tank.Now, and after 4 years of my last visit, I was really glad to go into that place again.We got the Researcher tickets which basically give you access to the tunnel, the under water zoo, and the behind the scenes experience.The tunnel is widely known to everyone. As for the underwater zoo its a really nice experience zoo like but related to water animals/mammels. As for the last thing its a really impressive matter which you should not miss as you get access to how things at this amazing facility work such as, food preparation, veterinary hospital, water treatment....but the coolest part of the visit was when we got the opportunity to go down to the water level at the aquarium and throwing food to the fish. The part of this visit is a guided tour. Guides are really amazing and answer all ur queries without any hesitation. They are on top of things.One important thing also is that you get to see the giant crocodile laying there in the water...Its majestic !!!Anyone visiting the mall should definitely visit this site and enjoy itPS: you can book ur tickets online just like I did nevertheless, you will have to wait inline at the counter to exchange the e tickets with regular tickets, so basically its a waste of time
Amazing Experience - 1st Class Adventure!. We did this thinking that it was just the Underwater Aquarium not realising that there was also a ZOO ... which is simply amazing, what a bonus!!!
Holiday. Brilliant place to visit specially if you have young children seeing all the fish swimming around you. Well worth a visit to see some exotic fish's.

great family day out. from the massive wall if gigantic fish . free to see in the mall. to the aquarium, this was so good, not just a quick pay and then out again. you do have so much to see here. we stayed for hours. the settings are loverly. go see the king size alligators too, amazing.

Big aquarium. Greate big aquarium With lots of fishes and all other species.
Many fancy and colorful Fish to watch, small and big.
hyped unnecessarily. you can skip this as its nothing interesting and too small.. rather spend that money and time shopping at the mall

Holley day tour. Dubai aquarium n underwater Zoo is one of fienest word lavel aquarium in Dubai .there so maney wonderfull types of unbeleveble species r there in under one roof.my family is very happy to see it.thanks to maker it so good again it's wonderful nice place.

Not worth it.... It is absolutely not worth paying 200 AED for walking through a small tunnel at the bottom of an aquarium. After having visited the Oceanariums at Bangkok and Melbourne at a much lesser price, I have to say this place is just not worth it.

Water womderland. This is so amazing. You get to be taken around the aquarium with a boat, whilst watching all sorts to water species. The underwater zoo has all types of animals that live in water and out of.

Budget friendly. The place is huge...or should I say colossal? The tank is giant size or ginormous. lol No really this is a great activity to do in Dubai. Please take one of the different tours inside the aquarium instead of standing in the mall and taking pictures...annoying... The tour is full of fun facts and the boat ride on top of the aquarium is pretty neat. I can say it is a must do activity in Dubai.

Pretty Awesome. This is an extensive aquarium and I would recommend one of the "behind the scenes' tours to get a closer look. The place gets very busy so arrive early and enjoy so quiet time with the fish, the penguins, the hippos and the giant crocs before the crowds show up!

Amazing aquarium inside mall. We got combo tickets with Burj Khalifa. First you go in underwater tunnel with very big fishes and sharks. After that you go on second floor where is the bigger part of water zoo. There are many species with many interesting animals, like crocodiles and penguins. It's clean, very nice to see, recommended to families.
Loved it! Must visit for everyone!. My first visit and it was amazing. We visited the aquarium, zoo and fed the fish, a package worth the money. I would definitely take my kids there.

Very Impressive. A selection of different ticket types are available, offering customised visits to meet your preferences. Limited viewing is available from the mall, allowing the free viewing, but buying a ticket offers a great deal more, and I believe is worth the money.

Very good experience!. A great experience to get up close and personal with some fish and sharks! The time in the water is more than enough.Do not do the snorkel dive as you will not get to see things as clearly a the shark walker dive. If you don't want to do the scuba dive, do the shark walker. It's a great one off experience.

Amazing!. This is not just your average aquarium visit. like most things in Dubai it is done on a grand scale. Very relaxing to walk through the tunnel with fish and sealife above and all around you! Can recommend a visit for old and young.
Poor experience. It's pretty limited what you see and what you get. The aquarium is inside Dubai Mall but that is it really. If you pay for the all the other extras including feeding fishes????

Recommended. Went with my 4 year old and he really loved it. The aquarium was so cool with the sharks swimming above and all the other fishes. The under sea zoo was really nice as well. Highly recommended if you have kids they most definitely enjoy it.

Worlds largest Aquarium. Its amazing what money and technology can do.The Sheik of Dubai has created aunder water marvel in the desert.The worlds largest indoor aquarium.With 10 million litres of water and an underground tunnel below the aquarium for visitors.The price is AED 120 per head for the first level of ticket.Its worth it if you like sea creatures.The water is transported all the way from the sea.Dont buys photographs inside.Its a ripoff.AED 85 for one measly photo.

Over rated fish tank. First visit the Dubai and went to see the aquarium.I went for the basic option this includes a walkthrough the tube that runs under the big fish tankand a look at some smaller fish tanks at the top of the mall.They also try to sell you two grossly overpriced picturesthey take of you before you go through the tube.Dont bother is my advice look at the side of the fish tankthat costs nothing and I don't think you will miss much.

AMAZING.... How do they manage this incredible feature? We watched the drivers quietly going about cleaning the stones, rocks & floor of the Aquarium & the fish, sharks & rays simply swam around them as if they too were fish! It was beautiful to watch schools of fish glide about & the rays dancing like huge butterflies....well worth the visit.
Aquarium. This is free to look at and see how many fish you can spot. Must have cost a fortune and is a really good attraction.I never get bored of it.
enjoyed full sized acquarium in dubai mall. one of its wonderful creation in dubai mall. King size crocodile is the center of attraction here. Awesome place. Dont miss if you are going to Dubai

fantabalous experience for the entire family . must so with kids as a Combo of aquarium and underwater zoo ...this time I went inside with the kids ... it is a very fulfilling and knowledagble experience overall last time we had not gone in . this time we opted to spend 2 hours plus inside and throughly enjoyed watching the beauty they have created... got many clicks as well so have your camera fully charged up beautifully done up and we'll designed not very large but with lots of variety keep time for exploring the king Croc section is like awesome ! we got some great momentos back with precious memories

Definitely worth a visit. I had no expectations and have seen quite a few aquariums but this one was truly interesting and different not only by the size of it but also by the angles you could watch the sea life from as well as the variety of species. I recommend you take the tour where you see the aquarium both from the little boat that drives on the top as well as the feeding the fish experience. I liked in particular the jellyfish and shark variety.
Amazing!!!. Amazing... The collection of aquatic animals seen is brilliant. Especially the king croc... A massive beast...

I live in Dubai. The Aquarium is nice and very big, you can either watch the fish from outside for free or you can buy a ticket and go through the class tube that goes through the aquarium, the tube is ok (not good not bad), you can even pay more money and dive in the aquarium, i haven't done that but i assume it's nice.The zoo is nice too I'd give it 3.5 out 5 it has some nice fish and marine creatures, and big penguin pool where you can watch the penguins play and swim.

A must for tourists.. Dubai Aquarium and underwater zoo is a must see for tourists as well as residents of UAE during vacations. I have lived in Dubai past 15 years and recently moved, it's one of the places that my kids miss the most.

Incredible. What an amazing aquarium! Crowds would stop and stare from the outside. We could only imagine how amazing it was from the inside. There were some paid exhibits to swim with the sharks that i would have tried,but i was with family.

good experience for children.. totally over priced. the walk through aquarium was just ok but children enjoyed it but those fishes , sharks, etc could be seen even without paying the entry, Next we went to the underwater zoo, that was a good learning experience but they should have proper marked directions cause people are walking in all directions. With this ticket we also had simulator which was not worth it. you don't even feel you are underwater etc. the experience was bad. And last was the boat ride and feeding fish ( extra 10dhs) which was good.Children will surely enjoy it but try getting a voucher beforehand cause the entry fee is expensive.
Not to be missed. Not to be missed only checked it out from the outside but it did look amazing and next year I will definitely be going inside.
Small but modern. Its not the most impressive Aquarium you will ever see, but the size will differently attract your attention. Its very modern and it has many big sharks!!
OK but free with city tour bus tickets. We goth the free voucher with our city tour bus tickets. the walk throu aquarium is not the wow and I would not pay for it. may be bit fun for little ones.

Escaping the heat with small kids. Good place for small children as an indoor activity now the summer is coming. During the week it not so busy and nice to meet up there with friends for morning activity. Also you can include to see the Dubai Mall Dino on your way out. Residents can get a yearly membership card which is good deal and allows discount for your visitors when coming to visit Dubai.

If you like to see water livings then must visit Dubai Aquarium.. If you like to watch Water Living mamal or want to explore more about them then you can try going Dubai Aquarium, from counter take Explorer level ticket which will allow you to explore aquarium at its best. In dubai aquarium you can also go for ScoobaDiving which will cost you 2000AED and you can enjoy with more then 2500+ water species. It is one of the must try activity in Dubai
Kids would love this place. A fun activities for kids to do in the mall (so the Mums can shop!) It is not very big, but good enough for them to kill some time.

Wonderful collection of Species. This place exceeded the expectation that I had... right in the middle of the Dubai mall, this place provides a wonderful delight. The King Croc from Australia is one of the attraction and the video of its capture and transport is interesting too

Marine life up close. We paid for the Aquarium and Underwater Zoo components only. This combo is 70Aed per person however we used 2-for-1 vouchers so it was 140 for 4 people. The aquarium itself isn't worth paying for. You walk through a 50m tunnel and the fish etc swim over and next to you. But you can just stand on the outside of the big glass wall and see the same thing. I was disappointed that there was very little live marine vegetation in the tank. The kids liked the underwater zoo because they could observe different small species of marine animals up closer. There could be more labeling of the tanks themselves because to work out what was in the tank you had to move to a digital display and find the fish on the screen for information. It was a nice way to spend an hour if you get tired of the shiny shiny mall.

Okay . The aquarium was okay not that exciting to see. Was able to go through the exci it quickly. The hotel was beautiful and definitely a sight to see but the aquarium was just okay, I don't think it's worth the money.

Expensive but with voucher it's worth it. We used the entertainer voucher and could visit the aquarium and underwater zoo for 70 AED. For this price for two persons it is absolutely okay and you can enjoy a good time taking selfies with sharks etc.

Underwhelmed. Located in the Dubai mall, this walk through the aquarium is not worth the entrance fee. You can see most of what is on offer by watching from the mall itself and the superimposed photo offered at the end is a bit of an insult. Nice people but poor delivery - should just be free to walk through and let people enjoy !

A nice place to go, a little bit expensive, but very interesting!. We were around Dubai mall and we saw that giant aquarium and we got curious about it. We did the tour and they offer great information about the species within it. Also the people of the aquarium were available for further info.

under the ocean. seeing the massive aquarium makes u feel every thing in dubai is kingsize.going thru the tunnel and seeing the fish just at a touching distance makes u breathless.the zoo is another quaint feature.
Fun time. Shopping whilst sharing the view with sharks is a first for me. Plenty of variety and worth a visit, especially if with a family.
Great Aquarium in the region. Certainly, one of the best aquariums in the region. Well maintained. It's in the likes of Chicago aquarium.

Dive with the sharks!. We are SCUBA qualified, so decided to take the plunge and dive with the fish (to include some sharks) in the Dubai Mall Aquarium. Great! There are other options to experience the aquarium closer up other then walking by. A lot of good exhibits inside the Zoo. Great for kids.

Wonderful Place to Visit in The Middle of Dubai Mall. The first impression was not encouraging from outside, but when you get in it is large one. Starting with amazing underwater tunnel after that you have another two levels of underwater world. it cost 100 Dirham around 28 USD.

Lovely Zoo. This is great attraction in Dubai Mall.In a small space they have done great job.Aquarium is fantastic as you can see thru Glass wall.And there are some varieties in Zoo which you have not seen before

Interesting. The aquarium was bigger than I thought it would be and I was surprised to see some Australian exibits (which was nice). Moses did a tour around some of the tanks, he was very informative and interesting - it was the highlight of the visit (and the jelly fish!).
All of the staff were lovely,I had a great visit.

Underwater Experience. A very big aquarium inside the Dubai Mall, Amazing right? Sharks, sting rays and many other fishes are here to find. King Croc is upstairs waiting for you. Ready to explore and learn more at the Dubai Aquarium and underwater zoo.

Don't just a book by its cover (wall). I really didn't have high hopes for this place judging from the outside I assumed it was going to be really small but the upstairs zoo area is really big. The otters are cute and King croc is massive. Fully enjoyed the time we went around. Plus together with going up the Burj Khalifa we only paid £36! Perfect.

An Excelent Place to Visit. This is an awesome place to visit in Dubai some of the various species to see in it and you can walk under the tunnel is something that you don't see every day. Make sure that you purchase the ticket with the boat ride in it so that once you see it from the outside take the glass bottom ride and then you can see it from above and how they are feeding the RAI and the Sharks as well is something that you don't see up close. I took my family with that ride and my girsl were thrilled.

Adventure in Dubai. Visited this aquarium with a combine ticket to the Burj khalifa, is a better deal if u buy it this way, 100.00 dirhams for aquarium n 80.00 dirhams for Burj khalifa, the aquarium also has an underground zoo, so worth the visit
Beautiful Aquarium in Dubai Mall. We came across this Aquarium right in the middle of the Dubai Mall. The massive peace of glass is amazing and the sharks and fish are wonderful to watch

Aquraium in a shopping mall. Well worth a visit if you are in the mall, A wonderful 3 story high (or close to it) aquarium right in the middle of the Dubai mall, it is unique and the mini zoo has some very cute animals especially the Otter's

A Real Treat of Dubai Mall. A Huge Water tank at the Dubai Aquarium is very large, I think in the world. If you go third floor of The Dubai Mall, you can see live show of sea life. Kids will love the fun and you can see their excited faces.

You can just pass by . All the attractions are all together. It's pretty hard to miss out this one. Since we have been to too many aquariums, we didn't get in but the outside is quite impressive already.

An aquarium in a mall. Never saw aquarium and zoo middle in a mall. It was very Nice and friendly personell. Only 1 bad thing is booking online , you still need to pick up tickets and wait like everyone else. Why book online ? I wanted to skip lines

Wonderful!. We are an older couple and have seen lots of aquariums but this would have to be one of the best .
If you have children this would be a must for them. It was fascinating and we enjoyed our time ther
great aquarium. It is one of the best aquariums i have ever visited in my life ; kind staff and a lot of diverse sea creatures . We liked the australlian allegator .....

I can't believe that this is in the mall! . When my friend suggested me to go here, I never expected it to be in the mall. But the fact that it is, it makes it even more special. You can pick a variety of package. I mean if you are busy you can just take the shortest tour and it is already amazing. I love the fact that k can go shopping in the same time!

pleasantly surprised. The aquarium is probably smaller than you think and it is easy to be in and out within minutes. However, the Aquarium and Underwater zoo together is a lovely experience, with lots of sea life. A very fascinating place with much to see.

Not really worth the entry fee. Yes, it is impressive to build an aquarium in a shopping mall, but that is what Dubai is all about - showing off !As far as an aquarium goes, I was underwhelmed. There was no real information about what the fish in the big tank and tube are or where they are from, what they eat etc etc.Some enormous crocodiles kept in a tiny enclosure, as well as some other species kept in conditions far to small for them.Not recomended

Its lovely to see so many different type of marine life. Very cool and awesome. Its lovely and peaceful to just stand and watch the fish swim around.
Its inside Dubai Mall so thats nice too
worst place on earth. this place is nonsence ! purely money making racket, with no customer service, all the staff are in their own world, no proper customer service etiquettes !
John . Exceptionally well done and presented attraction that is a must see when in Dubai. Such a great variety of marine life and we spent hours wandering through the different aquariums.

Spectacular. This aquarium inside the Dubai mall is amazing.The views are amazing and you can see different kinds of sharks and fish.The place offers diving snorkelling and other activities also.Definitely worth visiting
Nice but not that special.. The aquarium and Underground Zoo are nice. A lot of different fish species to see! Big sharks, little fish and turtles, crocodiles and even penguins.
Ok but nothing too extraordinary . I feel there is more fun watch the fish from outside for free then visiting inside. There us not much more to see once you inside. At least that is my opinion.

Spectacle!. Keeping an aquarium was my childhood passion so perhaps this review is biased ! Lol ! Sorry can't help it :)
It's free to watch from outside , captivating variety of fish and marina creatures and everyone seems to love it :)

Magnificent. This is great value for money and is really impressive. The glass tunnel at the start is awesome and the sharks and Rays are right over your head. There is a huge crocodile in a separate tank that doesn't look real until it moves! Great place absolutely loved it. One minor criticism the simulator was potentially a great idea travelling underwater but the graphics were really old fashioned. For a city which is the highest spec ever it was disappointing.

Great but a bit overpriced . Amazing aquarium. You go through 3 floors to see the whole thing. Sharks and other big fish are found on the lower floor. Jellyfish, starfish, and all sorts of smaller fish are found on the upper floor. However, the price (100 AED per person) was a bit too much I think. Anyway, you only go there once.

Awesome attraction all within in a mall. Another one of those amazing things you have to do in Dubai. I planned on going here with my wife as we were on our Honeymoon. We were not disappointed. Loads of fish were and marine life on offer in the main tank and also the glass bottom boat ride was good. The other parts of the aquarium were also cool especially the King Croc. There is a good variety of other animals for paying guests to see. If given the opportunity I would go again and pay for a more expensive ticket which will allow us to see the back of house areas.
Fantastic Experience. You should definitely go inside and experience amazing animals swimming around you! The second floor has many other attractions, good if you travel with kids.
Felt it was Average.. You can try this if you have done pretty much everything in Dubai and you still have free time. Since its in Dubai Mall, You can just pass by this.

Awesome. The biggest and best acquarium I have seen. My son went diving in it! Vast and impressive shopping mall with a great water display at the bottom of Burj Khalifa. Great place to spend some time if the weathers too bad for outside activities. Great for children.

We got free tickets to enter as we purchased a 48 hour hop on hop off bus tour of Dubai.. Was OK for an aquarium in a busy city. The highlight for me was seeing the large crocodile from Australia and the video on the TV nearby on the story behind this animal.

Worth a visit. This is a great place to visit whilst in Dubai. The fact that it's in a shopping mall is just amazing!We spent a good hour and a half walking around. Lots of things to see, we saw the crocodile feeding which was really cool. There are lots of marine life there that I didn't even know existed!One thing thing to warn you on is that the photographs taken by the staff photographers are absolutely astronomically priced! But all in all if definitely worth a visit.

Small Aquarium with good variety of fishes. This is again a part of Dubai Mall. The aquarium tunnel is a small pathway with variety of fishes in it. Underwater zoo is infact a value for money attraction. Please note you can purchase aquarium plus Burj Khalifa tickets as a combo and save atleast 60-70 AED. You also have a choice to upgrade your tickets for Glass Boat ride, though little costly, its worth the excitement kids go through.Good place with good variety of aquatic animals. Worth visiting.
Great idea. This was certainly a great attraction for anyone coming to visit the dubai mall.The sealife in the aquarium was impressive.
Relaxing day out with the family. If you'd like to take a break from your shopping in Dubai mall, this is the perfect breakaway for an hour to an hour and a half.

Well worth a visit even if you are not a fishy person!. Much to my surprise, I really enjoyed this attraction and think it is worth the money. We spent a good 2 hours looking around and saw some amazing creatures, especially the huge crocodile ~ I have never seen one as big. Children will love this experience.
Entertaining and educational. It was entertaining especially if you have kids with you. My nephew loved it. It's good option for a family activity when you are in Dubai.
Marine life views. Great marine life to view within Dubai Mall. Not much of variety to see. Bit of disappointment. Colourful fishes.

Awesome. This is inside Dubai mall only. The indoor aquarium has a viewing tunnel through the middle, a large fish tank, about 50 metres long. There are too many sharks and fish in such a small area. But it a fvery good experience. It was rush when we visited. My daughter enjoyed a lot by clicking pictures with fish.

Fantastic experience!. 100% recommend this experience for everyone!I wasn't too bothered about going inside the aquarium, but we decided to go inside to kill some time before our slot for At the Top. We purchased the basic package which allowed entry into the tunnel, underwater zoo and the back of house tour, which cost £20 each - best deal I think we had our entire trip!The aquarium is fascinating, and the tunnel allows you to see many types of marine life that you would never normally get to see so close - especially the sharks and sting-rays!Underwater zoo was great with plenty of animals to spend your time looking around, including otters, crocodiles and penguins.The behind the scenes tour was a unique experience and incredibly interesting - very friendly staff who were keen to tell us about how they are working to breed certain animals and fish. This also included a visit down onto a platform inside the aquarium to see how they feed the fish up close. Will definitely visit again on our next trip!

Excellent facility one has to see to believe that such an Aquarium can exist. This is a wonderful aquarium with lots of marine animals that are living along side each other without one turning into a prey.This is a must visit place n Dubai located in the Dubai Mall.Only that one has to be careful about some Chinese Photographers that will snap you and charge exorbitant fees.

You cannot imagine an Aquarium in a shopping mall, it is stunning!. Can't believe what I saw when shopping in Dubai Shopping Mall, a beautiful Aquaruim with stunning fish. This Aquarium is huge and is a fantastic attraction for tourists. They even had a diver in this Aquaruim, wow!

Loved this atraction. Perfectly located within Dubai mall it offers spectacular views of Rays. Sharks, eels and much more. The underwater walkway is truly the best way to see the aquarium. Or why not buy a triple ticket which offers a submarine experience and boat trip around the site. Also the zoo is a fantastic place for the children and the adults. So much to see and truly a value for money experience.

Interesting waterpark . The waterpark is in the middle of the Dubai mall, the tunnel is cool but was very busy, then two floors up in the shopping mall are smaller aquariums which are interesting to see. Takes about 2 hours to see it all
Lovely . It's a great place that is located in Dubai Mall. We watched many types of fish and others and we spent together a great moment watching it.
Nice Place. Nice place to visit with children. Plan in advance and find enough time as there may be crowds, especially during holidays.

A very good place for little kids . We visited the aquarium and found the 'displays' to be very good and informative. The part where you learn about the feeding and types of sea animals was very good too. The crocodile section was impressive but the size of the pool area for such a big Croc seemed a bit small bit in fairness the Croc is massive! A small tip too - use the cash register upstairs as it seems to be a lot quieter than the one on the ground floor. Well worth a visit!

Great experience. This is 100% recommended to do during your visit to Dubai, with or without kids. There are 3 different packages you can purchase, we purchased the basis package which allowed you to go through the tunnel, entrance to the under water zoo and a behind the scene tour (cost around £20 each)The tunnel is good fun watching fish, sharks, etc swimming above you (could spend ages in here, just watching the fish). The under water zoo, is an aquarium with lots of different fish, etc, including a creepy crawly section, and a massive crocodile!The behind the cpscene tour last around 20 minutes, and is very interesting talking about how the breed and look after all the fish, etc.Would recommend doing this whilst in Dubai

Looking at sharks from inches away. Incredible water tunel where sharks are swiming. Really worth visiting. There is a couple of ways to get in for free. Most city bus tours include a ticket or get one together with Burj Khalifa ticket. Lots of fun for the entire family.
Surprise. An excellent break to a shopping day. In addition to the observation of the tunnel we went to the zoo and experienced the boat with glass floor. All very interesting and organized .

Excellent. We really were not expecting to much from this but decided to do it anyway. We are glad we did. It is a lot bigger then we expected, the fish hospital tour was very informative and interesting and there was lots of animals and fish to see, the glass floors and glass tunnel is a good touch. Would definately recommend going if you are looking for something to do for a couple of hours.

Indoor aquarium & zoo. I visited last year and there is entrance fee for just Aquarium and another pass is for both aquarium and zoo. Aquarium is nice to see and lots of sharks. But for me I enjoyed more at underwater zoo upstairs. It is worth to visit in Dubai Mall.

Dont miss it!!!!. if u r in dubai dont miss to visit this aquarium in dubai mall. it is one time visit experience only. elder ones will surely enjoyed this visit. going with more than 4 people is best choice. u can capture so many momenta of different fishes from under the water and above the water

Good for kids. It's a good place to visit if you have young kids. Personally for me I did not find it extra ordinary and have seen bigger and better aquariums than this. However, considering the visit with young kids, it's a fun place to be. It's not a very big place so walking through it is not a big deal. There are some interesting animal encounters available if interested. The main attraction is the underwater tunnel. However, it's not a very long one. But still gives a good glimpse.
Good adventure . It's amazing to live the moment , but it's a bit expensive most of the visitors they prefer to take photos rather than trying it

Great place to visit!. We visited the aquarium and zoo prior to our Burj Khalifa slot which was later in the afternoon. So glad we did! It was an interesting and welcome diversion from the shops - with the main aquarium being so breathtakingly huge to start with - you just cannot miss it, we were not disappointed! You can spend a while just gazing up at the fish there, but we opted to pay to go in and go through the tunnel and onto the zoo.They have some great exhibits including a huge crocodile, biggest we had ever seen, plus all sorts of fish ranging from Marine/reef species to Amazon river types etc, etc, animals too; Otters, Bats, birds and lizards - would keep all types of people and wide range of ages amused for a couple of hours or more.

Best part of the trip !. Aquarium visit was the best part of my visit. Seeing thing that you only get to see on TVs is something one looks forward to.Breathtaking views and amazing creatures !Just loved the whole experience !!!
Excellent !. It is located in the Dubai Mall, very well made and recommendable to see.. however the drawback is that the aquarium is very small

many many fishes and sharks!!!. Dont miss it and dont hesitate to pay the ticket for pass the underwater tunnel and also take the 2hour tour around the fish zone which is located near the aquarium.There are a lot of fishes and sharks,some of them never seen again,,Great chance for photos and a face to face contact with the hummer-head shark!!!Lot of caribbean and pacific fish.At the fish zone you can admire the couple of the crocodile some tropical birds and fishes and stand behind the scenes to get know how all this thing set up everyday.

biggest indoor aquarium. We had no idea it was so big! It was incredible, they had so much on offer.. it was well worth the amount they charge, was our highlight of the mall. would be terrific to go if you have kids!

Better than sea life!. Decent aquarium with a large display in the mall and a 180 degrees underwater tunnel. This mall also has an underwater zoo which is home to some lovely sea creatures. The ones to watch out for are the red jelly fish and the monstrous King Croc. For 120 AED you can do the Explorer package which includes a glass bottom boat ride as well.

Fub. Did this with my 3 year old when we went on a visit. Just big enough and enough fish for him to see and be super excited. We did the boat tour and indoor zoo as well. The boat wasn't really worth it, but the little zoo area was great.
There's something about a walk through aquarium in. The middle of the mall. It was really neat, if you have kids with you it would be a great place to cool off and keep them entertained.

Amazing. Been to loads of aquariums, this is up there with the best. Had a great time walking round here and seeing all the different fish. Loved it and it looked like all the kids there loved it too. Well worth going here

Quite good. As part of our on off bus trip this was covered. It is in the middle of Dubai mall. It was a pleasant way to pass the time. There are limited options in Dubai to visit. We enjoyed this one.

Fab way to break up a shopping trip with kids. Popped into Dubai Mall on our first day and took our daughter to the aquarium. She loved seeing the King Crocodile and walking through the tunnel with sharks and rays overhead.

The Dubai Aquarium. Of course, you can't miss seeing this amazing aquarium! If you are single, married, with kids or not you not be disappointed! It's so big it will take you a while to see all of the amazing fish and sea creatures that live in the aquarium.
