Great One Time Experience for the Kids. Aquarium was really great for a one time experience especially with a toddler. Has a lot more than just an aquarium, as it has an entire experience center on the 2nd floor.

Good experience. Amazing big fish and sharks. this aquarium is a big tunnel that you go through, so you can see all the fish literally next to you. Unfortunately the tunnel doesn't last very long so you won't spend more then 10 min in there. Highly recommend getting full ticket for the underwater zoo. Loads of fish, jelly fish and the biggest crocodile there too.

Excellent. Well worth a visit. Went there and took a dive and swam with the sharks and other marine and fish life. The experience was mind blowing that you could swim with these man eating creatures something that I have wanted to do. This is really unique place.

Good if you have time, but not essential in the visit to dubai. If you have time to kill its good to see. Wander around the area first though as you can see some of the even the large fish from the outside. What you can't see and the benefit of going into the Aquarium is how they manage all of this. There is also a facity where you can see them feeding the fish, and a couple of other hosts where they do talk about the fish/penguins which is interesting. Good to entertain children.The tunnels that you see are good to walk through seeing the sharks going over head.

Diving with sharks 😁😊😊 good fun. We went to dive in Dubai to discover that because of all the dredging in the area, there is not a lot to see, so we went to the aquarium (biggest in world) to dive. It was great fun... Lovely to have such large amazing creatures so close... But at £150 per person for one dive (in a tank) it is very pricey.It is an experience and when a shark or large stingray is inches from you it is amazing ... Just needs to be cheaper.Al-Boom are a great company though with really friendly helpful staff all over Dubai

Family activity or kids activity. I enjoyed going to the dubai aquarium however unless you have kids it's a nothing special inside comparing to other zoos or aquariums.
If you just go to view it from the mall where the big glass window is it's amazing. But not worth paying a fair bit to go inside as there isn't much more to see.

To be inside a mall: Fantastic!. I did one of the extended "behind the scenes" tours. The main tank with the tunnel is just plain awesome! And the rest of the aquariums and terrariums are really nice! Lots of different cool species, and an own "night animals"- section. If you like watching cool animals, I really recommend doing the whole thing!
Cool Experinence. Very nice experience to be here and try the underwater zoo.you will relax and feel awesome well recommended

SCUBA DIVE IN dubai aquarium. If you an adult and have diving licence, don't forget to bring your licence with you because you Scuba dive in the biggest fisk tank on earth . Don't worry, sharks are so cute because they are not wild as they raised on the fish tank. You can have a sit on a cadge and they put you in the water to have a deeper look. N.B.: don't forget your Diving log book.

Well worth a look. Situated within the Dubai Mall complex the aquarium and zoo are welcome relief fro all the shopping. Many species can be viewed all around and you constantly see something new. There is a charge for admission but if you take the open bus sightseeing tour admission is free.
Grand Aquarium. Very well kept three storey high aquarium very well cared for and effecient service. Enjoyable moments to cherish

Not the best Aquarium I have visited... Nice Aquarium, but I believe the one in Sydney was bigger and better! If you want to visit it you must pay entrance but there is a big glass wall inside the Dubai Mall where you can take some nice photos if you don't want to pay and get it.Big variety of fish is a plus... but in my opinion there are more better places to visit and spend your money if you want in Dubai.

Amazing Experience. Being in the middle east for more than 6 years it was a pleasure to see and experience the Dubai Aquarium. Hope there is similar to this in Doha so that other people will experience what i had in Dubai.

There are plenty of fish to be seen also would you believe Rainbow Lorikeets from Australia !!. In the middle of Dubai Shopping Mall and rising for 3 floors , it was a very entertaining aquarium and zoo. A lot of great conservation work going on there
Nice aquarium. This was okay attraction at Dubai Mall, we enjoyed our visit there! There was no lots of people when we visited so it was okay.

DUBAI AQUARIUM. This place is absolutely entertaining.
if you are in dubai mall & u choose to spend your time except for shopping, VISIT THIS PLACE

Very interesting... So different!!. It was a very different and spectacular experience.
I thought that I will see more... but what I saw was very representative.

Take advantage while you're there. Beautiful, a lot of variation of fish, amazing glass tunnel.. Great experience..
It's a good addition to the shopping trip!
Just view it from the outside!. Left a lot to get desired to be honest!! King Croc needs a bigger location to live in, left me feeling sad! Save your money and just view the tank from The Mall.
amazing+. kids love it. amazing fish all around.we will be back next year for sure. very nice time to spend your afternoon
Average. don't buy the tickets.....its too short, waste of money, the aquarium is not that big, good for very young kids

Dubai's little fish tank. Visit this aquarium and paid 100 diram each for me and my wife. Went through the Glass tunnel. Amazing. However we got to the end of the tunnel and felt mm not really worth it as you can see most of it for free from the Mall. However you come out of it and then go upstairs to continue your visit. You then see some of the breeding areas and then lots of smaller tanks with some great fish and small animals and a Croc very good value in the end.The photos they take are very expensive so we did not bother with them and the entry price gave us some money off in the gift shop which we did use.
Really Nice. Awesome aquarium, much larger than it initially appears when passing by in the mall. I highly recommend checking it out!

I have seen better . The experience was ok but it wasn't wow and there isn't much to see. I paid to go on this little boat on top of the aquarium. It was disappointing as it lasted less than 10 minutes and we couldn't see any fishes clearly.
Easy location and a great change to shopping. Well worth a look. Good enclosures, clean and varied. Includes a huge croc from Cairns, Australia which was very cool.

DUBAI AQUARIUM - GREAT EXPERIENCE. Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo is a very must visit attraction when in Dubai. The best part is the Boat Ride in the Fish Aquarium which will cost extra Dirhams. The total cost including Boat Ride will 120 UAE Dirhams.

Great value for money lovely aquarium. Great experience and loved being in the tunnel whilst surrounded by swimming sharks, rays and fish. Afterwards going around the difference parts of the sea world and seeing how it worded was a good insight. Then the last part going round the smaller tanks with everything from fish to crocodiles was great.Only paid the cheapest entry but was very good value for about 3 hours. Definitely recommend this for all ages.
Awesome. Our friends were impressed throughout the whole experience. Nice place to take your visitors especially if they have children.

Short and Sweet One time Watch. Being a resident of UAE, I have visited inside just twice. Its a short 100mtrs trip and you can feel under the sea effect. Worth a try especially if its your first visit. Click some photos and stare at those confused fishes swimming in groups. I always used to feel that those fishes think they are traveling miles. :)

Aquarium and zoo. nice for the little ones but again too commercial, you are directed past the in house photographer before you can get in, the photo then is thrust in your face half way thru and the cost is very high at 285 Dirhams if you want it.... the underwater tunnel is not as long as you are led to believe but it is ok, nice for the little ones but at 100 dirhams each for a basic entry it is a tad over priced

Its ok, good for children . Well, from advertisements I expected a lot more from this place .... They have a decent underwater aquarium, but overall experience seems to be something I would go as a school kid .... Would recommend to make it more exciting, At least the underwater simulation should be 3D ... I think my HD TV gives a more real experience

Worth every penny .. Really nice experience. Its worth . The basic ticket cost is 80AED (as on july 2014) with which you could go through this underwater aquarium tunnel , visit the aquarium/zoo , behind the scene tour ( instructors will tell you how they maintain the aquarium and you will also get a chance to feed the fish . Also a 10 AED gift voucher will be there which you can redeem at the outlet they have .
Good for Kids. Overpriced entry Would recommend this for family's with kids and people who have not seen fish in water. The best view is free looking in from shopping centre.

Admiring God creations. All Aquariums are fascinating places but the tunnel in Dubai make it different, although the entry of 100 Dirham is a bit too much other wise worth vising well maintain healthy and huge variety of fish.. u get 10 dirham bounce each entry tickets to spend in the souvenir shop, enjoy

Tunnel walk was awesome. Incredible experience. Observing the underwater wildlife during a tunnel walk was magical. The back of the house tour was organized OK and I learned a thing or two about underwater fauna. The zoo was also interesting to watch.

A submerging experience. The aquarium is massive and sits in the middle of the mall. Everybody can view the outside of the aquarium without paying an entrance fee. However to get close and to walk through the tunnel through the middle you need to purchase one of their packages.They have different packages starting from 100 Durhams which provide for different experiences including diving with the sharks.I took the basic package which was the aquarium, a ten minute tour of behind the scenes - how they grow the food, etc (quite interesting) - and the underwater zoo.An option for 10 Durhams is to feed the fish. This involves throwing some pellets into the water for the Trevally to eat. As no-one in my group had paid for this the guide did it. Unless you have young kids recommend you save the 10 Durhams.The underwater zoo is great - lots of small aquariums and other displays of aquatic creatures. If you like zoos or have kids then an absolute must.
Excellent. Close encounters with Tiger Sharks, Manta rays... incredible! Easy access from the Dubai Mall and a fascinating way to spend an hour in the midst of shopping stupor.
Very enjoyable. This was enjoyable and interesting, things are well displayed. Children would love it. A good range of things to see.
Deep sea dive. Beautiful a must see. You may go inside the tank and swim with the fish. We stayed on the outside. To be in a mall and see all the different fish was wonderful. Very relaxing.

Fishy fun for all ages!. If you like aquariums you will really enjoy this one. We got our free entry ticket with our hop on hop off tour bus, we just asked the driver for the ticket and printed it off for us.
Overrated... . Expensive and highly over rated. Felt ripped off... The submarine graphic tour was so poor the quality seemed 20 years old...
Great !. Fun to walk through a live aquarium it is like you are underwater. It is located in dubai mall, ask for directions

Worth going just for the Fish tank!. This whole place was amazing, and as it is a shopping mall its free to browse, we went here a few times, and the evenings which is the time most people come out we found the best it is meant to be the biggest shopping mall in the world it has every type of shop you can think of inc a Woolworths although this seemed to be a clothes shop! it had everything, even an indoor ski slope ultra clean as well and budgeted for everyone, i felt sorry for the local well to do Emirates with more than 1 wife (1 is more than enough) as when they bought something for 1 wife they had to buy them all one!!! this mall is next to the Burj Khalifa also the tallest building in the world with the fastest lift in the world and well worth the trip up the tower (I wouldnt want to walk the stairs!), we wnet up here then did the mall, outside and only i imagine in Dubai where 3 police cars one was a new 4 seater Ferrari the other was an Audi R8 and the other was a Bugatti Veyron what a job! But the fish tank is awsome
Fantaaaasticcc. It was really a great experience visiting The Dubai Mall and the Aquarium during my short trip to Dubai from Saudi. Really wonderful than expected. A must visit.

looks better from the mall side. Imressive from the mall side-disappointing from behind-very short walk from the picture here you can see the enire length of itthe bonus is if you buy a combined ticket you also get entry to the min zoo on the second floor-on the smallish side-2 big crocs-some penguins and lots of different fish tanks-you better off if you buy the ticket online just print the voucher out and show it at the desk where they issue a paper ticket for you

This was very fun to walk through. This was a great thing to do my 4 year old loved to see all the fish. You can see some of the aquarium from outside but you are unable to see the underwater zoo from outside. When we visited they had a package deal that included a ticket for this, the ice rink, the movies x2, kidzania & sega for $220 AED. This is a fun place to visit. In the zoo my son was able to touch a starfish.

Unusual A Huge Aquarium in a Mall Shopping Centre!. Certainly worth the visit to the Dubai Mall for both shopping and food.The huge indoor aquarium with those sharks, stingrays and other beautiful fish is well worth a closer inspection for both young and old.Get in early as it will get busy later in the day and leave the shopping mall tour for later in the day.You will also be able to view the Burj Khalifa from this centre and the water display shows in the evening.We enjoyed the centre and also to get away from the soaring heat outside for a few long hours.

The Dubai Mall Aquarium. Although a short experience at the Dubai Mall, this Aquarium is impressive. At little bit priced but everything is expensive in Dubai.Impressive walk thru tunner under the water and great experience visiting their lab, the guide very well educated in anything related to the place and their mission.
Really great place for a visit with kids. Really great place for a visit with kids and adults alike. Enjoyed the experience overall and it's a must-do for a tourist in Dubai.

Dubai Mall Aquarium. This aquarium is visible from the inside of the mall. While we did not go "inside" we got the exterior view which allowed us to see much of the sea life that is house in the aquarium; including sharks, sting rays and many types of fish. If you have the time, I would suggest a full tour. It is inside Dubai Mall.

nice attraction. the aquarium is great,,,clean and its a great attraction for the kids to see all kinds of fishes and while you are in a mall..a bit confusing though as the underwater tunnel is on the ground floor and the rest of the aquarium is on a different floor ,,,after seeing and walking through the aquarium we almost forgot that we had paid for the tunnel too...but the staff was understanding they let us in with a little verification and all...
Lovely walk through the aquarium!. Such a nice calm place to go for a walk and see some amazing creatures! Definitely worth a visit if you're nearby! Something quite mesmerising about it!

Beautiful. We were in early before this became too busy, well worth it just to see the diversity of it all. Would seem to be used heavily as an educational outlet as many young school children were being shown round by teachers and to see the happiness in all there faces showed the benefit of such a place.

Aquarium in Mall. You will be surprised to see such a huge aquarium built inside Mall. Incredible.They have huge collection big fishes & small as well. Maintenance & cleanliness at par. You have opportunity to walk through the tunnel built under the aquarium by paying a fee. A MUST VISIT PLACE

Interesting attraction. If in the mall this is an interesting attraction to see the numerous fish, Rays and sharks calmly swimming by. Whilst impressive within the tunnel, I felt watching from the mall was better for the sheer size of the aquarium. If you have the opportunity try and see the on at alantis hotel on the palm that one is also great.
Whaou !. You should go to Dubai Mall to see that, as it is really unique. There is sharks inside ! You can see that only in Dubai

Love the sharks and the big fish. I love the sea and the mareen life, can't get enough of it at all, the aquarium is big and also you can see some other animals such as snake and crocodiles in separate tank.

worth the visit. Well worth visiting, amazing to see such a huge aquarium and underwater zoo in Dubai mall. The amount of different varieties of fish is very interesting.
The only downside is photographs high price, the photo price is more expensive than ticket price !

Just another aquarium and zoo. Only in Dubai....The amazing thing of this is that it is in a shopping mall. Pretty much the same set up as Sydney Aquarium, a walk through tunnel with fish, sharks and stingrays. Includes a viewing from a glass bottom boat. The zoo was only small and the crocodile actually comes from Queensland. More of a novelty visit than anything else.

Neat attraction. The aquarium is a nice break from shopping with the wife, and the kids will enjoy it. It is easy to imagine you are diving in the ocean with the walk through tanks and the tour in the boat on top was informative.

Average, but worth it.. The entry is a little expensive (UAE100) and the aquarium, inside the mall, is obviously not that big. Portugal or Califormia offer better options. But since you are in Dubai, worth the visit.

Great andytime of the day. Great place to bring the kids too. They can spend hours gazing at the fish and now with a complete package ticket can even feed them and have access to Aquarium and King Croc enclosure

Dubai Mall Aquarium . Great. That One was Super Visit . I took A great Pic For me and My friend. Too Many Kind of Fish . Its Clean Inside . But the Photo is very Expensive inside if you let them photo you

Huge Aquarium!!. We booked the basic tour, which was sufficient. and includes walk through the aquarium tunnel and entry to the Zoo. Zoo was very interesting with lots of great marine and other creatures to look at. Tunnel a bit crowded at times.
Excellent aquarium for adults as well as children. Well worth the money. The underwater tunnel was amazing and the range of fish was brilliant. Loved it.

A bigger surprise at every corner.. I've done quite a bit of the tourist thing in Dubai since I've been here, and it begins to seem as if everything is overpriced, so when I got to the entrance of the Dubai Aquarium, I thought here we go again. BUT the underwater tunnel simply blows your mind away, the aquarium gives you a generous dollop for your money, and then the underwater zoo, which is part of the attraction is amazing. It seems to go on and on, and just when you think you've seen it all, there's another whole section of fun things to experience. Truly the hidden gem of the Dubai tourist circuit, in fact I'd pay the cash to do it again. Get there early, wear comfortable shoes, and try the virtual googles. It's twenty bucks extra, you look like a fool, but it's something different and that's what we're all looking for. (Negative: They could look after their otter a little better. It looked like it was taking strain.)

Surprisingly good for an attraction in a shopping mall!. We through we would do this before our visit to the Burj but when we initially saw the queues were going to leave, however paying by credit card to one of the staff outside meant we went in very swiftly. Didn't take the full experience but walked under the aquarium (around 14 sharks included) took the back lot tour (very short but interesting and a very enthusiastic staff member feeding the fish into a frenzy made it entertaining too!) and then the 'zoo' which is a bit of a mixed bag. The zoo includes a large crocodile - king croc, usual range of tropical fish, large and small as well as penguins. Found it quite entertaining. Cost was roughly 20 Uk pounds each and we spent nearly two hours there. Some queuing inside for the back lot.
A Little Smaller than Anticipated. This Aquarium is not as big as I thought it would be. I have seen larger more interactive aquariums. If you can get this one for free I would take advantage of it.

Well worth a visit if you want to escape the shops!. If you're out in the shopping mall and have the time, the aquarium is well worth a visit. You can see the huge tank filled with all sorts of fish, rays and sharks as you're walking past and you can't help but stop and look.We booked in to go cage diving in the tank and were provided with a wet suit, snorkeling gear and instructions from the dive team. We were shown to a reasonable sized cage which was submerged right in the centre of the tank and was part metal bars, part perspex glass. It was a great experience having the sharks swim right past, just inches away.Once we'd finished in there we walked around the rest of the aquarium which was quite big and contained some great sights including the biggest crocodile I've ever seen!As you exit the main aquarium you get to walk through a perspex tunnel which goes straight through the main tank and gives you a great view of the fish and sharks. Well worth a visit if you have the time - probably around an hour to see the lot although you could spend a lot longer.

fun to swim with sharks and other marine life. Went there and took a dive and swam with the sharks and other marine and fish life. The experience was mind blowing that you could swim with these man eating creatures, something that I have wanted to do but to be able to do it in the controlled env ornament it was great. Well worth the money and was not expensive at all

Looked pretty amazing. Full disclosure. We didn't go in the Aquarium but watched it form the mall. Amazing. I don't think I have every seen larger sting rays and sharks in an Aquarium. Not sure if it would be worth it to go in, but I am sure it is over the top just like nearly everything else in Dubai.
amazing. this is a really unique place to visit in dubai mall, the ticket is 160 darhem, for all the attractions inside, must visit it, the best water zoo in Dubai

Averagely impressive . I expected much more from this aquarium. It's cool that it's based in a mall. The underwater tunnel at the beginning was nice, I thought there would be more of these in the overall aquarium. Good to see with kids

Not bad to spend time. The aquarium from outside is available for everyone to see but if you perches a ticket you will enjoy the inside underwater tunel. The better part is the underwater zoo in the second floor which is a place u could spend some time with your kids showing them fish species. I personally loved the Atlantic aquarium more ...

Wow. Its an amazing place. You can see varieties of sea creatures, and even you can catch the starfish :) The toddling of penguins and jumping of seal fish.. its really freshen you. Need ti have around 2-3 hours to make a full round.
Not special one. It was not special compared with that of Istanbul. The price is also very high and not logical in respect to the options and service.

A great experience for the children. We lived as a family in Dubai for 5 years but never visited this attraction. Last Easter, however, we returned for a short holiday and became tourists. We took our 12 and 14 year old boys to The Aquarium and Underwater Zoo and they were delighted with the experience, complaining why we had not been before?!To cap the trip we then had a window seat at The Rainforest Café (which looks into the aquarium) to round off a truly aquatic experience.

Worth every dirham. Truly awesome.. I have never seen such an underwater zoo before in my life. Its just marvellous. For as less as 70 dirhams per head, you get a double bonanza. First the tunnel aquarium where you get to click photos with the sharks, squids, octopuses and what not. And then you head to the 2nd level of dubai mall where you enter the underwater zoo which houses the world's longest and biggest king croc. Its really huge and the poor thing had a limited access and area to move around owing to its big size.The merchandizes were expensive.

Out of the world !!. It is the largest aquarium in world. If you are in Dubai don't forget to visit this beautiful aquarium and underwater zoo.it has all types of fishes including lots of sharks and sting rays. Most beautiful part of the aquarium is the tunnel.

Wow!!. My family and I had a wonderful time at the aquarium at the Dubai mall.master card had an offer of buy one ticket and get another free and we bought our tickets via the offer.beautiful collection of fishes and marine life.the king crocodile at the underwater zoo upstairs is really really big.nice place for a family visit.Bravo Dubai!!

FANTASTIC!!. The acquarium was fantastic, an amazing experience!! It's not everyday you can get that close to stingrays and sharks!! There are also smaller tanks of fish, penguins, otters and even an alligator. Very reasonable entrance fee and worth every penny!

The best aquarium . If you stay in Dubai city, go to Dubai aquarium the best one and the biggest.. you can book your tickets online because if you go without booking maybe you will wait for some mints.

Started off feeling amazed but left feeling disheartened. A walk through the main aquarium offers the chance to get up close to so many creatures that most of us would never see out in the wild. Sharks of many types and sizes, rays .... my daughter (studying marine biology at uni) and i went up and down several times. We the progressed upstairs to the 'zoo' and after seeing a few fishy exhibits that were interesting we came upon the giant croc who it seems is destined to live in a concrete enclosure with no natural light for many years to come. Whilst he has his female mate with him I felt it to be devoid of any stimulation. A similar story for the penguins. Admittedly conventional zoos are not my thing and so I left feeling just a bit disheartened to feel that these creatures were all now living in the artificial confines of a shopping mall. Many others have been and loved it though so my opinion is just that.

Must-see !. As Dubai weather is extremely hot, malls are organized as mini-cities.Dubai Mall offers a wide range of different activities such as: Ice Skating, Arcade games, Shopping etc.Visiting the Aquarium is one of them, you can spend an hour with your friend or family day dreaming looking at those magnifcient animals.
Blue World. Situated in Dubai Mall... A dream place for children... You can do many activities here. Get 120 AED ticket .

Go and visit. It's Brilliant.. Brilliant huge aquarium. Great for the children but also equally great for adults. This is big aquarium that you can walk roung and walk under. Then you can go a see how it is maintained and learn how they feed the inhabitants of the aquarium. you can even feed them your self. If your into diving you can dive with the sharks and fish.
fantastic. i visit it in july 2015 really i surprised with the good level of the place.they have varies type of fishes.. also varies type of animals.i enjoyed my visit there and i hope to visit again

Great fun!. Considering that this aquarium is a side attraction in a mall, it is very impressive.A great selection of different fish, birds and reptiles are on display including a very impressive crocodile and some decently sized sand tiger sharks.The obligatory under water tunnel is perfectly adequate and if you manage to get in in time for the shark feeding, you will definitely have a good time.The glass bottom boat ride adds a unique touch that you do not see at every aquarium and is something I can only recommend.

Interesting beautiful and educational. Ive visited this place several times alone and with my family One of the biggest i've seen .being a diver and a dive instructor means that i know a thing or two about marine livings With my kids it gave a great chance to show and explain few things about the sharks stingrays and going to the otherpart of the zoo we saw alot of different ecosystems and at the end we had a great family time i highly recommend it when you are at the mall take the full package not just the junnel ...its worth it

Underwhelming. Before going to Dubai, I had Heard and Read so much about the famous Aquarium,So Naturally, It was my first thing to see in Dubai, I Paid 120 Dirhams and I Have To Say That it doesn't deserve this much money.First Thing is you take a photo, but to take that Photo with you You have to Pay 290 Dirhams !!!! (The price for the photo is more than the price of admission for the whole park).It starts as a tunnel, you go in and all kinds of Fish swims around you, then you go for the boats, which goes around for 5 minutes and you see fish under you (the bottom of the boat is glass), The You See The Underwater Zoo, Which has Many Kinds of Sea Creatures Including The Crocodile.I Cant Say I Didn't Enjoy Some of it, But in the end It's Expensive and Honestly, There are So Many other things to See and Do in Dubai.
You should see. Once only once you should go where. It is wonderful. I saw many sharks. No words only feelings. Go and enjoy the underwater life

Fantastic. I believe its the largest acquarium in the world. You can see quite alot for free from the mall but if you really want to see the fish up close then pay the entrance fee and go in. Its a little expensive but well worth the money, for a bit extra you can also visit the zoo section with what I believe is the largest crocodile in the world. Then if you are feeling really adventurous you can go up the Burj Khalifa which is the tallest building in the world its right next door.
View from the Mall. Wouldn't visit this again. Everything you need to see you can do from the Dubai Mall itself so don't bother paying to go in unless you want to learn about the aquarium itself.

Might be worth seeing. its pretty good but can get very crowded. The huge tank is the feature and quite amazing. The behind the scenes tour is somewhat interesting but the guide seems to have a speech and can't answer questions. There were a few interesting species of fish I hadn't seen before

Dubai visit. It was a great journey to dubai.Dubai is one of the finest city have ever seen.One of the greatest place is burj khalifa and dubai mall next to it.It is really 8th wonder of the earth. While the giant aquaram which has been built in the mall is really awesome with lots of varieties of fishes in it including sharks.Enjoyes a ot in that trip. Would like to visit again and again to dubai.

Good but expensive. The aquarium is good and you can see the tank from the mall. The tour guide was friendly and informative, and guests were able to see him feeding the hungry fish, that was great. The only negative was it was dear to get into the aquarium and you had to pay extra to go the zoo part, hence we did not go to the zoo.

Nice and elegant. A huge acquarium with a big variety of fishes, birds, crocodile and other animals and insects showed in a very nice and elegant way.The place is organized and full of fun specially watching the Australian crocodile which is considered the biggest crocodile in the world.But there is a lack of food and drinks around just one small ice-cream shop which was expensive and not tasty at all
Busy. Great for children albeit very busy. The zoo was far better than research bit. When older we will return and do the under water zoo glass bottom boat.
Adventure . Enjoyable For Everyone So Much To See & ExploreUp Close & Personal Very Spacious & Clean Lots Of Fun At Slow PasteDefinitely Would Come Back & Do It All Again
Fish paradise. If i were a fish, this would be my ideal spot :) The place is well run, immaculately maintained and very clean. Its always a treat to visit this place - very professional outfit.
Awesome. Beautiful. One of the best . We went on the tour behind the scenes and was so impressed with the science and technology they use. Worth a visit
Fun . First time to be there? You will need at least one hour to go through the activities. The kids will enjoy it too, especially the tour where they show you how they feed the fish
Stunning in every respect.. Another must for anyone visiting Dubai. Spectacular to say the least. Huge aquarium with amazing array of sea life.

Biggest Aquarium with a monster croc. Dubai Aquarium & underwater zoo are two very excellent attractions. Located in Dubai mall there are different experiences you can purchase before you enter. You get up close to some scary sharks with only inches of glass between you & if that doesn't scare you than the size of King Croc just might. A must see you wont be disappointed

More to see than you think!. When you turn the corner and see the massive tank at the end of a shopping Mall it is nothing short of spectacular. However this does not prepare you for wonders you will find once you pay the admission fee and enter the main Tunnel which is as good as any i have seen anywhere else in the world.The back of house tour is part of the standard package and is well worth seeing.Then you move upstaits and enter the zoo and initially it appears as though you are just going to see one or two exibits but its like a maze and just goes on and on and there is so much to see at every turn.We spent a good 2 hours in total and only paid for the basic package which is really all you need.Highly recommended as part of a full day which takes in the biggest shopping mall in the world and the tallest building in the the world - only in Dubai.

Not value for money. I visited Dubai mall and went into the aquarium for an hour. It seems that it is great from the outside. However, once you are inside you will discover that you are looking at the same thing but after paying. Its not of great learning value. There are no lablws on most of the tanks and I would say that kids will have a 3/10 lerning experiance.

Wonderful sea world. This is an amazing piece of a floating art you can stand in the mall and watch all kinds of tropical fish Manta Rays to Sharks and watch them swim around this amazing floating tropical sea world with all the amount of Coral and it does not cost you anything unless you wish to go in and be taken around but just watching outside is still amazing

One of the biggest aquariums in the world!. Hello, My name is Bogdan and I have visited Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo in September 2015 inside Dubai Mall. I have to say that is one of the biggest aquariums in the world, with a huge variety of marine animals. It is a must see if you are going shopping in Dubai Mall. You will find lot of chabers with different species of fish, for an extra fee you can feed them and even make scupa diving in this huge aquarium.Don't miss it! Best regards, BogdanRomania.

Huge crocodile - king , monster !. I paid 120 AED for the basic tour including 4 activities, the zoo is excellent and it's incredible to see this giant crocodile, never expected to see such monster there. The tunnel is OK but not the best. I did not like the photos taken while you enter and finally at this end if you want to buy it cost 260 AED ! Crazy. Better refuse to take this shoot anyway, I did not see anyone buying it.

Amazing!. Located inside the Dubai Mall, this Aquarium is one of the best! A great experience and a big insight on the marine life and various kind of aquatic animals! Everything inside a mall! Unbelievable!

Great for a break from shopping. The kids really enjoyed visiting and with the Entertainer voucher it was very reasonable. I do think the most impressive part is the immense scale of the tank which can of course be enjoyed for free from the mall. King croc is worth viewing though.
Really beautiful. Worth the money. Doesn't need lots of time to be done and you can see a massive crocodile (around 6 meters I guess, extremely big).
Very well stuctured. Very nice aquarium, we'll placed, made most of the space. King Croc was a hype but interesting place to visit none the less

Wow. What a place! Made me think about the potential of humans and majesty of nature, what I did not like was that the staff there took a photo of is and tried to sell it for us at the exit of the aquarium for a over rated price

Aquarium water zoo. Located in the Dubai Shopping Mall, this Aquarium and Zoo is not only for the kids. From the huge floor to ceiling aquarium to the oversized crocodile this attraction is well worth the visit you can enter chamber room and see the different types of fish small shark

wonderful experience. In the middle of a shopping mall, there is a three story aquarium! I bought the explorer package. You must visit this aquarium. there is a very cool walk through tunnel under a 10M liter tank, a glass bottom boat ride up above. you can feed the fish (and sharks) and with a different package, you can even scuba dive! Glad i experienced it! I highly recommend it.
A must visit place. Been there few times, Love the sharks swimming there, where else you would see such large creatures in the comfort of your mall visit, a must visit place

Incredibly well done attraction in the Dubai Mall. We visited the aquarium tunnel, followed by back of house tour and underwater zoo. The whole attraction is incredibly well done and interesting for kids and adults alike. You can even go inside the aquarium to dive if you like!
Great place with lots of fish and lots of water !. Beautiful must see especially if you are visiting with your children, but not limited to as I fully enjoyed it myself !
Under Water Zoo in Dubai Mall. A nice experience within the mall to watch sea animals and other creatures. You are in a tunnel and sea animals are moving around.

Disappointed. Thought there was going to be a lot more to see and that it was going to be much bigger. It's really not any more impressive than any other aquarium. "Back of the house" tour component of the experience was interesting to see but boring at times. A much better outing for families, especially ones with young children, but otherwise, skip the ticket and just look at the aquarium from outside the exhibit. That's what I wish I would have done.

Interesting but not worth the money. Was good but a bit over rated in my mind Dont Pay just go on to 3rd floor and you can see everything Having a tropical & Marine Aquarium the Zoo as they call it was a bit Disappointing

They made this inside a mall? What a wonderful idea!. Quite an amazing feat, especially as one can enjoy a lot of it free if you just look at it from outside, through the aquarium glass. But you can actually pay and go through inside, and there you see the alligator also.

Take your time. We brought our nephews when they visit us here in Dubai, despite hearing some poor feedback on the place. We had heard that it's over too quickly and there is not alot to it, however we found it quite different. If you take your time in the tunnel you can get to appreciate what a cool place it is, and the Underwater Zoo with King Croc was brilliant too, probably the highlight.As a tip to make it affordable I'd suggest to get an Entertainer book which has offers to help you save quite a bit on the entrance fee. It has lots of offers on other places too.
Loads of pictures to be taken here. Have been to the Dubai Aquarium twice, more has been added to it since I last came in January 2015. Loads of pictures to be taken here

Fascinating. This was quite an unexpected site as we went into the enormous Dubai Mall. This floor to ceiling giant aquarium had every fish you could think of swimming happily around. Even sharks...We particularly liked the giant stingrays that liked to go tummy up against the glass , probably to watch us too.. I have never seen the under side of a stingray so closeup.... Awesome....and free too...

Must see!. Husband and our got free entry with a City Sightseeing Bus tickets, fabulous and grateful for free entry but if you pay, you still won't be disappointed. You must visit this aquarium it's not like any I've seen in England. We even got to touch some starfish! Don't be out off if you don't have children either, we don't and didn't feel awkward, plenty to see as an adult. Husband even had a go at the virtual diving when you first walk in. This cost about £5 and hubby said it was great fun. We only spent about an hour here, probably last longer if you have kids. Really glad we went, highly recommend it.

See the big Croc !!. Located in the Dubai Shopping Mall, this Aquarium and Zoo is not only for the kids. From the huge floor to ceiling aquarium to the oversized crocodile this attraction is well worth the visit.

Wonderful aquarium . Lots of fish and other sea creatures to see! Well designed and a large aquarium. We especially loved the penguins and crocodiles! We paid for just the aquarium and underwater zoo which was reasonably priced and kept us entertained for a couple of hours. Would recommend if you are visting the mall. Gift shop has plenty of section with reasonable prices too.
Great day out.. Came here with wife and kids, my two year old daughter loved it, I think the photos are quite pricey at £16 for a magnet, wow!
Dubai Mall Aquarium. Great feeling to see variety of fishes swim in the middle of the mall. The aquarium breaks the monotony of the mall

Great Fun. This attraction is amazing for being in the mall we seen they did a croc feeding attraction which we was intrested in but it stops around 4pm and there is no advertising to say so however we did the adventur package and you wonder around the underwater zoo as long as you want and then we got the back stage viewing which was very good with a very knowledgable leader who let us feed the fish who was abit crazy and you step on a glass bottom ground which is a bit crazy but really good!!Well worth the money would recommend for any ages.

Wonderland for kids & who love fishes. Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo will be a very attractive location for kids & who love fishes( Ornamental :D ). Its one of the major attractions of Dubai mall and you can watch plenty of fishes & its actions, feeding etc... It will be worth if you like fishes.

Exciting must do . We enjoyed the collections of sea life,, the place and the amenities are outstanding . Make sure to read more about the marines species before visiting, so you to appreciate it more.
Fun day out. It is in the middle of Dubai mall but once you are in you dont have the feeling that you are in the mall anymore. we had very fun day. My sun was extremely happy.

Worth the money. There are 3 entry passes and the aquarium is excellent with plethora of fish varieties. Diving in the water is a great option (you need to pay extra though) and you can swim along the shark with a guide by your side. The kids would love this for sure.

We were skeptical but had great fun in the end!. As we were in the lost chambers in Aquaventure we did not expect anything new... but our friends had some good arguments so we tried it out. We payed only 70 AED per person to see the Aquarium (100 m tunnel behind the glass) and the zoo (very cool!). The experience last around 60-90 minutes and every minute is worth watching. Being so close to a shark makes you really feel nervous a bit... :) also the HUGE Crocodile has made an impression on us (zoo). Photos as always far too expensive (nearly 300!!! AED). We also used the opportunity to use Oculus Rift for 20 AED to get a 360 view under water. It was really good and my first experience with that technology. Also this a MUST SEE :)

One of the most visit in Dubai located inside Dubai Mall.. The biggest Aquarium in the world located inside the Dubai Mall with so many sharks and many types of fish. You can imagine how big is the Mall and there is a free attraction in the Aquarium with motto "Summer is Dubai".

nice big aquarium. its a very big aquarium in dubai mall... good for taking picture capture all the fish inside the aquarium... you can see different kind of fish.. they are big and small... its a nice tourist attraction.. love to visit here.. the nice spot to take nice shot of photo...
A great thing to do with kids. Nice thing to do with the family! Do the whole tour, both zoo and aqarium. Se toke the boat tour, nothing special but a fun thing for smaller kids.
A must see. Took the family to enjoy the Aquarium using tickets. Was a brilliant day out and would definitely go again.

Dubai Mall Aquarium & Underwater Zoo. Dubai Mall is enormous, we walked for 7 hours and still didn't see the 2 top levels. This aquarium is 2 stories high and can be partially seen without purchasing tickets.

Average Aquarium. The aquarium is cool but I could have done without it. It was neat to the do "back of house" tour and see how they feed the fish. But realistically, you probably have just as interesting of an aquarium in your home town. It's a good activity for a rainy day, but make sure you have a coupon or discount code!

Not so good to pay and watch.... It is not a great experience, as it is a small tunnel and not worth watching as we can see the same thing from outside in the Dubai Mall. I recommend you to visit Aquarium in Atlantis hotel.

Really great addition to our trip. Very cool exhibit.....very random in the middle of a shopping mall but great attraction. They also give you an opportunity to dive with the sharks and other fish which looks awesome
Great aquarium. Great for little kids. Our daughter loves this. She can never see it enough times. The way it is set up shows the animals to their full majesty.

Impressive. I could have spent an entire day in the tunnel, mouth gaping open. The sheer size and diversity of the aquarium is impressive. I've see a few and this one had the largest Ray I've ever seen in captivity. Great photo opportunities and a nice break from the overwhelming commerce.
Good trip. This was a trip to do whilst we were in Duabi. We enjoyed our day here. Would recommend this to do if you were in the area

A very nice place for new comers. The aquarium of Dubai mall is a nice place to kill time and enjoy your day in Dubai mall it contains a tunnel that will allow you to have a close look to sharks and fish and it has an upper Zoo for the rest of the animals. A nice family place to visit espcially if you have kids.

Giant crocs in a shopping mall - only in Dubai!. For the price you pay and the easy access location, the Dubai Aquarium is pretty good value. There is a good assortment of animals living there, though some of the enclosures seem a bit small... and who would expect to find giant crocodiles living in a shopping mall?! Only in Dubai!
Stunning to look at. Amazing to find an aquarium in a shopping mall. We were busy shopping but would definitely take my daughter back.

A bit of fun while shopping. This was a great Aquarium in the shopping centre. We went on a boat ride around the top of the aquarium in a glass bottomed boat which was fun and then walked around the aquarium for about an hour.
It's Okay !. It was wonderful surprise within mall --good attraction specially if you are visiting Dubai during summer months. Overall it's bit small compare to entry free.

Quite enlightening, lot of variety of 'water' animals. Definitely worth a visit!. To start with, the walk from the Metro station to the mall was long which I wasn't prepared for, so I recommend Bus for those weary of long walks, though one also gets a wide window view of the Burj Khalifa, as well as a line up of tourist memorabilia sellers.Then on the Zoo/Aquarium itself, they have lots of water animals from miniature to large. There is a free view of the side of the aquarium from the ground floor of the mall but a payment allows for for entry into the zoo as well as a walk under the aquarium tunnel. An activity indeed worth paying for!

Very good and worthwhile to visit. I got explorer passage and thought it was very worthwhile. can't help some other arrogant selfish people joining you in some of the things but patience helps to get past this. Staff were helpful and the underwater zoo I thought was pretty good too - the croc they have is huge !!!
A MUST!. There is a whole large world of underwater creatures in this aquarium and you can have a great enjoyable time with your family visiting this place at the heart of the Dubai Mall!
Great even for the cheapest ticket. Great tour even for the lowest price one. Looking behind the scenes was something that I didn't think we would get to do but it was great.
Incredible. A huge aquarium at the heart of the Dubai Mall. You can view some of it for free in the shopping area or pay for the full experience. If you skin dive you can swim and feed the fish

Visit. Must take kids to underwater zoo. Lookout for entertainer kids voucher book. You can get lot of buy one get one free. Or check out billing receipts of carry fore. They've discounts vouchers printed on back side.
Nice to see .... the big aquarium is a must see. walking in the tunnel was also thrilling. the exhibition on the 4th floor is not the biggest but very lovely.

Amazing creatures by god. One of the biggest and all kind of aquarium you can find here.
Kids will love this and once they see they will not leave for sure.

Never gets old. My wife, my 3 year old daughter and I love the aquarium and underwater zoo.We brought a years pas (250AED) which gives us unlimited access to the underwater Zoo, the Tunnel and the glass bottom boat ride.THe tunnel alone is worth the normal entrance fee as a lot of the sharks are only visible through the tunnel.The glass bottom boat ride is great fun and the king croc is a sight to behold.The underwater zoo isn't massive but it's well thought out and a great way to waste an hour or two!

world of wonder. world of wonder.. you will get to see so many kinds of fish and water species you might not even have heard of.. big rats! big shark and other fishes. full of colours and full of life
Great view of Underwater world.. One of the best thing in Dubai Mall.. You can also get a great view of the aquarium for free from outside. Great variety of fishes too.
Amazimg. Big indoor aquarium. Nice boat ride and allot of information about different water world animals and fish's. And the glass bottom boat ride was amazing.

Great way to spend a very warm afternoon in Dubai. Fantastic Mall with unbelievable choice of worldwide stores and boutiques, entertainment places and restaurants. Very impressive aquarium very well kept.

Amazing but still a zoo.. Animals in captivity for human entertainment is not my idea of fun. However the Dubai Mall aquarium is a staggering piece of civil engineering. A simply colossal perspex window that is at least two foot thick stands between you and the incredible array of marine life behind it. Worth a quick look during your shopping trip.
Nice. Good with lots of fishes and varieties. Tickets are expensive. If you want to have a good outer look visit the Dubai Mall

Great Aquarium. The place is nice, and the animals are impressive, mostly the crocodiles and penguins. They have a wide range of 'underwater' animals.
I loved it!

a nice place you should visit while in Dubai. I am not a big fan of places like that (aquarium, Zoo...etc) but i was surprised it was more than just and aquarium, the prices are a little height or i would gave a full 5 star,
dont miss it its a very nice place for taking picture and the kids loves it

Good Attraction in the Mall. It's very hard to miss the impressive display of the aquarium when you visit the mall. The tickets are around 100AED. The tunnel is fairly short and doesn't capture how massive the tank really is. Once you're done with the tunnel (which didn't take us more than 10 minutes), you are invited up to the third floor and then do a mini "behind the scenes" tour. It was fairly topical about what they do at the aquarium and they do show the lifecycle of a few different animals they have there. The feeding of the fish was neat. I did find the tour guide too soft-spoken for size of the group and the ambient noise from the machines--she was too hard to hear.The zoo was nice to wander around in. Had a hilarious experience with one of their archer fish literally shooting my eye when I was watching them. King Croc exhibit was out of this world. All in all, the aquarium was a nice experience but I thought it was a bit too pricey. But, hey, it's Dubai. I think next time I'm in town I'll try to arrange a dive in the aquarium.

Highly recommended.. Not to be missed. A fantastic experience which I would highly recommend. You can view part of the aqarium from inside the Dubai Mall without spending a penny. We found paying the extra for admission was worth every penny.
Amazing. It was an amazing experience walking in the tunnel and seeing the fishes all around,Impressive and a must see while in Dubai

More school trip than family day out.... The aquarium is pretty pricey to visit and to be honest, the most impressive part is really the huge aquarium you can see for free simply by going to the mall. For the ticket, you get to wander through the tunnel which goes under the aquarium. However, it is really short and save for a few upclose Sharks you don't see anything more than you do outside. You don't get a feeling that you are really "under the sea" because you can see the mall and all the people outside still!The ticket also gains you access to the sea zoo upstairs.This contains loads of tanks of various interesting sea creature. From piranhas to otters, even a penguin tank (small and probably not that nice for the Penguins). The various fish tanks are pretty cool to look at.In the upper section you get to see some desert creatures in glass displays. There is also a humoungous crocodile in a tank who is pretty impressive.All the tanks are fairly small and empty of anything except the various animals so you can make your way around probably in an hour or so. It is interesting but not great value for money and the whole thing feels a little rundown and more for school trips than a family day out in my opinion. Maybe if you get your ticket as part of a deal that offers entry to other Dubai attractions, but on its own I thought it was overpriced a a bit disappointing.

what to expect at Duabis Aquarium.. the dubai aquarium is located in Dubai mall, you can see many species of fish and marine life.. and if your a certified diver guess what..? for a few extra AED you can jump in the tank and dive with the sharks.. don't worry they are friendly ^_~

A BIGG Fish Tank!! Worth visit. Given Five star as arranging so many species under one roor in a giant Water Tank is no joke. Something which is worth visiting especially with kids. They have lot to learn here about marine life. Recently they added a behind the scene of aquarium tour which is a welcome addition to understand how this place is manitained. A must visit at least once if u r in Dubai.

Nice place to be visited in Dubai Mall. The place is deserving to be visited while in Dubai Mall. The tunnel is on the ground floor and the underwater zoo is on the second floor. Best if you try the riding the boat and feed the fish. Also has a big crocodile. I liked and enjoyed it

My visit to the world’s largest indoor aquarium. I never knew until I visited today that the Dubai Aquarium is the world’s largest indoor aquarium. Its beautifully maintained and well organised. Definitely a must see attraction if one is in Dubai. Please use the online booking to book tickets for the aquarium as the queue at the venue was long today being a weekend.Once you get there, the first sight is that of the aquarium’s acrylic panel, weighing more than 245,000 kilograms and is in the world in Guinness Book of World Records. Whilst the marine collection at the aquarium was on par with what I saw at the London aquarium, the difference was the service of the staff.. The one in London was way better.

The best Diving in Aquarium in the wrorld. We dived in many aquariums around the world; yet this was the best in terms of variety of fish kind, less density which give you a better feeling close to natural diving. Number of fish schools and the shark sizes. Its amazing to visit, or to dive. If you are a professional diver ask for Dubai Mall Aquarium speciality which is approved by PADI

Large Aquarium. The Dubai Aquarium is in Dubai mall . It is a big big aquarium having different type of fishes in it. You can even see the Aquarium from outside. But if you are interested in researching how the aquarium is maintained and see the other fishes and crocodiles you can visit this . It is an interesting activity. Ticket 100 AED each.
Aquarium. Nice to watch and walk through the tunnel aquarium. It is very fascinating indeed and lots of fish and sea creatures of all types and colours. Amazing!!
Beautiful Aquarium. This is a very beautiful aquarium and provided some really great photo opportunities. I would definitely recommend it to family and friends.

If you look to kill some time inside Dubai Mall.... Good aquarium and great experience for your little ones, but if you've been to other aquariums around the world, this one will not impress you much. The huge crocodile was arguably the best exhibit.

Worth every penny.. Expected it to be a two minute trip through the aquarium but it was far more. There are options to scuba dive and snorkel in the main aquarium, behind the scenes tour, feed the fish and an indoor zoo with the biggest crocodile you have ever seen in your life. It is enormous.Good value for money and well worth doing.

Very nice experience especially for young kids. Impressive aquarium located in Dubai Mall with many different extra options to take a trip really inside. If you don't want to do scuba diving or cross water in other ways take a walk through a glass tunnel to admire different spices of fish. You will then move to second floor to learn more about them and how they are breed.Further on visit a zoo which will surprise you with a range of ( not only water ) animal you can meet there. You will spend more time close to king crocodile for sure.

Amazing but.... Amazing because of this 10 millions of liters of sea water and this fauna !!!!
But it needs more interactive games inside, about the fauna and the flaura.
A must do.. This is well worth seeing.it costs about £20 per adult, but you do see a lot . Absolutely amazing walking through the tunnel looking at the Sharks.
nice aquarium. Lovely aquarium with different fish and sea animals.A walk inside the walls of the aquarium is the high light of the visit

Combines the spectacular with fascinating detail. The Dubai Aquarium provided us with an experience where we can honestly say that we were truly astonished and educated at the same time. The main tanks provide a superb viewpoint for observing the major exhibits - including rays and medium sized sharks, which of course are open to public view on two floors of the Mall itself. We found the Underwater Zoo area fascinating - and the tuition session gave valuable insight into the management issues of maintaining such a huge complex as well as feeding the fish. If you wondered why the predators do not decimate their tank-mates, this visit will enlighten you. The prize exhibit is, of course, the enormous 5-metre long salt water crocodile. It is impossible to imagine what one of these creatures looks like unless you see it in the flesh - it is truly impressive. We visited on the basic "Researcher" package and found the experience very worthwhile.
King Croc from Oz!!. The KING CROC is here !! Blue water, Dolphins Penguins and the King Croc with the Oz Passport rules in this Dubai Mall Aquarium.. Great funtime with family n friends

Must See for Kids. Had been there with my 12 year old son. If you kids are tired of accompanying you for shopping, this is the place to be! The Glass bottom boat ride was fun. It takes apprx 1 hr for the visit.
Dubai Aquarium and Underwater Zoo, A Must Visit Place. Really a nice place to visit in Dubai Mall. Various type of Fishes kept inside the huge Aquarium. Also diving is possible for a very close look.

A fishy extravaganza. Impressive tunnel aquarium and more interesting exhibits on the upper level. Our trip included a very child orientated mock sub ride against an animated film- only worth it if you are 5, and a glass bottom boat ride above the tunnel aquarium giving you an alternative perspective. All tanks were immaculate and well laid out. Worth a visit on a hot day.
Amazing!. Never been soo close to so many amazing species before!The underwater zoo had been decorated so beautifully and you can tell that they spent a lot of money on this place.

Worth the time to visit.. Excellent variety of sea life. If you are adventurous, this aquarium provides lots to do.... feeding sharks from an underwater cage, watching the feeding of King Croc, and scuba experience with lots of sea life.

Good Experience. This Aquarium is located in The Dubai Mall, they have many options available for visitors, I bought the Researcher ticket. Researcher ticket allows you to have experience of fish feeding also. They have a giant crocodile in the underwater zoo. Overall, a good place, It is good for family and kids and the people who are fond of underwater world.
Dubai mall aqaurium. This is a must when visitin dubai mall, plenty to see and some amazing creatures, the croc was huge, kids loved it price was very reasonable, nice relaxing atnosphere
Awesome Aquarium. Must visit aquarium.... one of the guiness worlds record... nice quality of finishes...must visit.. a bit expensive

Excellent Underwater Magic. I enjoyed my trip in Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo It was excellent i had to see alot things for the first time. There was alot that i learned and watched and enjoyed. Good place to visit for adults and children.
kids love it. the kids enjoyed it,, however if you have travelled the world it will not amuse you more.. as it is same almost in every other part of the world
Dubai mall. I have been seeing same type of display so I was not impress by moth scale and design. I think they can do more extream stuff here in Dubai.. This was a bit normal for here.

Wow feeling after visiting this attraction. You will love to see the Underwater attractions in the biggest mall of Dubai and its all inside a mall. The way they have maintained this facility, its so amazing. Do not just buy the combo ticket, buy the one with boat ride, zoo, tunnel and the description of how they maintain the zoo and aquarium. Anyone will fall in love with this place.

I expected more. I loved the idea aquarium and the zoo but i really expected more. Maybe next time i should try the diving experience to get a little bit of extra satisfaction. However, my one year old was so excited of course, he was experiencing this for the first so he was overwhelmed. I guess this attraction is perfect for kids.

a must see adventure. i was just fascinated with the size of this place!Massive and just full of the coolest things. the underwater zoo was huge! we toured from above and you could actually take a glass bottom boat tour or even go down in a shark cage! Only in Dubai lol

Aquarium boat ride. Having took the tunnel tour we would holy recommend take the extended tour at the top of the aquarium. This is a fun boat trip that circles the top of the aquarium and provides a view you can't see in any other way. The boats are also glass bottomed.
Amazing experience..... Take the tour for an unforgettable experience of marine life! Also, hang around to watch the divers do a live feeding of the sharks!!

an absolute must see at the Mall.. You can not afford to miss this amazing aquarium, three stories high, clear blue water and hundreds of fish from sharks to stingray, to bream and other tropical species. You can spend literally hours standing watching from either the floor or up on the other balconies. If you wish for a charge you can walk through the glass tunnel under the water. Beautiful and educational.
DUBAIS ADVENTURES!!. First time here in this breath taking huge aquarium, i was so amazed, 10 millions of litters of water!!! Wow!!! Plus this is inside the Dubai Mall, unbelievable!!!
Beautiful. An unexpected find but really lovely in the Dubai Mall. Classy but different. I really enjoyed seeing this
Cool. If you are going to dubai mall you should get into this aquarium. It is huge and has alot of activities in it. You will be amazed of what are you going to see in this aquarium.
Visit to shopping mall. This is an amazing site, without going in the viewing area in the mall is large, and so many different species to look at.
Average . With 100AED costly effort to watch this aquarium. Little disappointed to see the entire tunnel and so called zoo. Many other destinations have better option compare to this
Exciting for kids. You will find a lot of types of sea creatures.The aquarium is huge!Place is very friendly for kids but quite expensive and very crowded.
Overcrowded on the weekends.. Nice place to relax, just not on the weekends, to overcrowded, lots of people on the weekend. I loved the space, the sea life is great.

Captain Nemo's World. What a relaxing and tranquil experience by just watching these beautiful creatures glide past. After shopping a while visit this water wonder world to gain sanity and peace of mind before exploring the shops again.
Amazing Place. We were there for around 3 hours, all family members (old and young) enjoyed being there. It is amazing place.

Aquarium and Zoo in the mall!. Went here after going up the Burj Khalifa. Went through fairly quickly, maybe less than an hour at the aquarium and zoo, but I was impressed with the selection of animals there in the middle of the shopping mall! the crocodile was huge! but the room he was in seemed too small for such a large animal.

Surprisingly good. Honestly, I did not expect much from an aquarium located inside a mall, but I was pleasantly surprised. My 12 and 10 year old kids enjoyed the tunnel and the underwater zoo immerses the visitor in an inviting and interesting way.
Typical aquarium but worth a visit.. Convenient location inside the Dubai Mall. It was a typical aquarium but they did a good job keeping your interest.
"Amazing "........ It was really a good experience for all of us.The ticket was reasonable and service efficient.Also enjoyed other attractions at the Dubai Mall.

Pretty neat sight to see.. This is a very cool attraction in the Dubai Mall. I did not partake in the zoo tour or enter the inside of the aquarium, but there is quite a view of the aquarium and sea life from the mall. You can see all sorts of animals including sting rays, sharks, tuna, etc. for free from the outside. It is really a wonder in the desert built inside of a mall. Impressive to say the least, and it is a great photo op.

I love Dubai!. It was a great experience.I don't have any idea about Dubai till my visit.I got inspired from Rehlat.com travel guides.Rehlat is a flight ticket booking portal.I enjoyed the Dubai.A memorable trip in my life.

Watch the Fish Watch You. A pricey aquarium visit (you can see most of the aquarium -- free -- from inside the Dubai Mall). Various 'tour' packages that allow you to walk thru the aquarium, take glass bottom boat trip, 'backstage' tours, feed the fish. Finishes off walking thru the 'zoo', lots of little aquariums and little fish. Nice presentation but overall, too pricey for what you got, would recommend for younger kids. Wasn't too impressed.

Sharks while you shop!. Brilliant aquarium and wildlife in the middle of mall! Yes, its all there behind the blue glass and offers a 5 storey display of marine life and reptiles, some of which you can touch and hold. The python is friendly and likes having his picture taken while wrapped around your neck.The guides are helpful and the giant spider crabs are something to see. An excellent experience for children of all ages. The visit behind the scenes is interesting too as an insight into the expertise and care needed to maintain the health and well being of all the animals.

Amazing aquarium. I was overwhelmed by the importation of the various fishes and spieces from all over globe. The aquarium was clean, and very new looking . The underwater zoo had quite a small collection of birds. But overall the aquarium is worth a visit its within Dubai mall.

Really impressive Aquarium and Underwater Zoo. My wife and I decided to use our Entertainer voucher but didn't expect much being in a shopping mall. I have to say we were both impressed with both the Aquarium and the Underwater Zoo. We liked it so much we went back again with our children who enjoyed it just as much as we did.
Mr Kome. Excellent facility with great variants of sea habitats. The zoo is also worthy of visit. The main minus though is the quite outrageous prices of the pictures.

A great experience. An eye opening experience. I visited the aquarium of my first week of visit in Dubai while going around Dubai mall. It was awesome. Relaxing too. The atmosphere will definitely take you on a different dimension and will relieve your stress. Divers are there too and they even join you on your selfies and random photos. A must do in dubai!

A best Place to have ALL in ONE Marine Life Exp.. The Place is Good Value for Money.You will get almost all major Marine Life species...It is inside Dubai mall, so You can visit During / after shopping, and other attraction also as Dubai Fountain / Burj Khalifa etc, Proper Time & Planning is essential...

This aquarium is great for people.. The Aquarium is in center of Dubai mall and its ticket is expensive about 100 derham . length of that is about 100 meters and has a tunnel in base of that and visiting is in short time.

Amazing. Amazing to see so many species of underwater creatures in this humungous fish tank. You can see the majority of it from the outside for free, but I personally think it is worth paying a bit extra to walk through the tunnel to get up close with the creatures and to also go to the additional areas where you can get up close with other creatures. Certainly worth seeing if your in Dubai.

Good for kids. We brought the package which includes boat ride. Initially it's going through the tunnel and that's really good for kids, they'll love it if they haven't done it too many times before.The photos they take for you were extortionate! Around £40-£50?!Then you go upstairs to the underwater zoo, the glass bottom boat was great, although bit confined.The information given in simulator ride was great for kids.The rest of the aquarium was just like any other in the world.
Looks great from the outside, but overpriced . As you walk up to it in the mall it's an amazing sight. But when you go in the attraction is average at best, and definitely not worth the entrance fee
Very good value. Very good value, we went for the green option and had a lovely evening. Make sure to check out the crocodile - he's awesome!!

A panoramic view of the waterworld and its creatures. This amazing spot of aquarium tunnel gives an inspiration of living not only under the sea, but also looking at the sea creatures even from bottom! This is really a must see in Dubai.

Really good tour guide with the Ultimate Package. We bought the VIP package and were given a 1 hour plus tour of the aquarium which included a glass bottom boat ride, backstage tour of the aquarium and of course a personal tour guide in a group of 6 of us.
The aquarium was better than the Atlantis aquarium and the tour guide was well worth it.

A change of scenery from stores inside a mall. An interesting stroll, but a bit of a short one. All in all, with a boat ride at the top of the aquarium, you could be done within 30 minutes, including queuing.
It is relatively impressive considering it is inside a mall, with lots of varieties inside the zoo.

Not worth the money - poor fish!. The tunnel is nice to walk through but most can be seen even without going in. And the aquarium is so packed with fish that one wonders if this is still ok. The underwater zoo and esp. the glassbottom boat ride and the submarine ride is not worth the time. Next time, I would rather spend the money shopping in the mall.

In the middle of the fish on DUBAI MALL. An impressive indoor aquarium in the middle of the gigantic mall, We love to see this [peaceful life in the massive water tank. Good for the children, very marketing place for Emaar the developper of this venue.

Surprisingly good!. As you can see the aquarium from the mall itself I thought what more could it offer?For the price of around 100 AED I found it very good value for money.The tunnel was actually really good and we spent quite a while just looking at all the different fishes. And from within the tunnel you can get so close to the different fishes and particularly the sharks which you cant really see from outside in the mall. After that you move on upstairs where there was a small simulator ride (more for the kids) followed by the boat ride whicjh is glass bottomed so you can see the fish from above and from a different angle whilst the guide gives various information on the fishes and what they are, what they eat etc which was very informative.After the boat ride you can then go through to where all the other fishes and animals are housed in their tanks which I didnt know was available from penguins to otters to a massive king crocodile. The only downside was perhaps there could be some information plaques by each tank explaing what each fish/animal is and some cool facts about them (where are they from, how old, what they eat etc). And also I think to try and take photos of people and then charge them silly amount of money for is a little over the top so would suggest to stop this or charge only a small nominal fee.Overall, regardless of whether you are a resident here or a tourist I found this to be well worth the entrance fee!
Incredible swimming with sharks in dubai mall. Really amazing and superd to see this big aquarium inside the dubai mall with tourists swimming with sharks, It's as well a must see but avoid fridays,
Beautiful but a bit expensive. Is avery beautiful aquarium with a lot of fishes and if you want to pay extra you can dive inside the aquarium.

Good, but.... It's the biggest and most beautiful aquarium I have ever visited in my life. What ruined the experience for me (therefore "very good" review instead of "excellent") was the ridiculous photoshoot. What's that about? It was kinda silly and embarrassing. And what's worse, later on you're trying to sell the picture to me for almost 50-60€??? That's kinda insulting. Anything over 20€ is insulting. Of course we didn't want that picture - I would never-ever spend that kind of money on a single photograph not matter how rich I am.

Use entertainer book and save. Great attraction. We had a great visit to the Aquarium. We have been to Dubai 3x and never visited and we were very surprised at how big it was and how much there was to see. We would definitely go again. Took some fantastic photos with our 5 month old Daughter who was hypnotised by all the fish!

Great.. Great attraction at Dubai mall defiantly worth a visit.They have various different tours available including a walk through, boat trip, feeding and even a scuba diving experience.Price wise it varies, for a basic walk through its 100AED (£17).It's a nice attraction and well worth a visit.
Kids loved it!!!. Visited the Aquarium and underwater zoo, the big aquarium is impressive but you get through it very quickly. The rest of the underwater zoo was very good and we enjoyed the day out.

Travel and See. I happened to see the world's largest crocodile at this zoo, night creatures had there natural habitat, and walking under the underwater tube was so mind blowing and lovely place. This can also be found at the Dubai Mall.

Defiantely worth £10 each for the basic ticket.. Beautiful fish and the crocodiles were amazing. We timed it well at the crocodile feeding was at 4pm...absolutely huge beasts! We got to touch the star fish and go behind the scenes of the aquarium with a guided talk. The view platform is brilliant for pictures. Very friendly and informative staff.

One of the best aquariums ever. This is probably one of the best and most affordable aquariums I've ever been to. You can even go on a boat over this immense and stunning aquarium and feed the fish and all this in a shopping centre! Als check out the 5 metre long crocs!!

Dubai Aquarium. so splendind and HUUUUGE. with HUUUGE humongous fish and sharks. educative as well. have staff who will explain to you some ins and outs. have official photographer who will also take nice pictures and give you usb with the pictures. wonderful and educative. definitely the largest aquarium iv ever visited with all sorts of beautiful and wonderful fish to see. and not only fish just undersea life such as sharks turtles. just wonderful

Must see King Croc. Just visited here for my childs birthday. Absolutely worth every penny. We went for the 120 AED package which included a glass bottom boat ride and the zoo. It took us 2hrs to go round the whole place and we could easily have spent longer . The zoo is very impressive with a great variety of fish and many other animals including King Croc.
Fish world inside a Mall. This is an interesting place to see if you like to enjoy sea creatures and animals and birds, has been made brilliantly inside the biggest shopping mall
very big Aquarium. Easily accessible by Metro ... can be visited in summer too... very big aquarium... if visited in evening , Dubai Aquarium, Burj Khalifa and fountains can be seen together

Awesome. Over 20 K fishes... and extraordinarily close proximity, along with a well orchestrated tour made it much better than expected at 120 AED per person. Spent an hour or so and truly enjoyed it.. It is an amazing experience and I can say its one of the best I have seen in the world - and I have visited many great ones across the world

Excellent Adventure with the fishes.... It's located conveniently inside the Dubai Mall easily accessible by the Dubai metro from anywhere in Dubai. The number of fishes and marine animals justifies calling it an Underwater Zoo. Loved visiting the place with the Mrs. and we both enjoyed the experience. We went for the basic experience as we didn't have much time. The aquarium is on the ground floor with all the fishes, manta rays and sharks swimming over your head. The Underwater Zoo with the marine animals is on the second floor. Was great fun watching the many sharks swimming over your head. The Manta Rays were fun and they even looked like they were posing for photographs. Truly a must visit if you are in Dubai and especially if you have kids.
